K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:197a-1: a'arya aa go gha p'a sha kalpa r'a dza /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:202b-63: na mo stu te sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:202b-64: bklags pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:202b-65: dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-1: bar 'gyur zhing las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-6: seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-12: chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-13: byad dgrol ba la ni mtshon gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-19: skud pa dkar pos rna ba la gdags par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-21: shing k'a ra b'i ra'i so shing gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-23: tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-24: mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-25: thams cad srung ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-30: tshon sna lnga'i skud pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-36: mgrin pa 'gags pa thams cad la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203a-38: pi pi ling bsres pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-5: skur pa 'debs pa thams cad la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-6: chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te kha ba shal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-10: yul 'khor rnams srung ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-11: bum ba gang ba bzhag la gos gtsang ma bgos pas mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas bklags par bgyis na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-12: des yang chab kyis gtor bar bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-13: sems can thams cad la srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-16: 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-17: glags lta ba rnams la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-18: tsandan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te snying gar byug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-19: mtshams ma mchis pa'i las thams cad pas par bgyi ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-20: rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-23: sems can thams cad bskyang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-25: gdon thams cad las srung ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-26: tsandan gyi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-32: tse dra ba ru ni dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:203b-33: aa bha ya ba ni dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-0: su na nad rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te nor bur bgyis nas spyi @204a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-2: dpung pa la btags pas bsrel bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-7: dpal dang ldan par bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-8: bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di bsrel na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-9: thams cad las srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-10: dug dang mes mi tshugs lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-11: dug gis gnod pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-12: skyes na yang gnod pa skyed par mi bgyid cing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-18: ser ba zlog pa la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-19: shing k'a ra b'i ra'i lcug mas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-21: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-22: grub pa dam pa ma bsgrubs par las 'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-25: ras la lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-26: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan ral pa'i thor tshugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-27: ae na ya'i pags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-28: phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-29: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204a-30: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can 'brir stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-0: de nas sgrub pa po sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te me tog dkar po'i sil ma bkram @204b la spos kyis bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-3: gzhan yang lha bshos sha dang khrag dang ma 'dres pa bshams shing drangs la aa ga ru'i bdugs pas bdugs te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-5: nyin zhag gsum du smyung ba bgyis nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal te dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas gos gtsang ma bgos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-6: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid mchis nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-8: mig sman la bzlas brjod bgyis te mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-9: de nas mi gda' bar gyur nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-13: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-14: mi mdzed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-16: dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-17: don yod pa'i zhags pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:204b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab 'byams thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' @205a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-1: sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer stong 'phro zhing 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'gyed pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-2: bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-3: snying rje chen po'i mthu yid la byed pas rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-4: snying brtse bas don thams cad grub par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-5: mchog sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-7: bdag la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i snying po 'di mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-8: 'di padma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid chen po'i snying por 'phags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-10: de kho na nyid sgrub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-12: dkyil 'khor chen po 'di phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-14: snying po rim par phye ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-15: gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205a-16: dam tshig dang sgrub pa gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205b-4: mi mang po'i 'khor chen po'i mdun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205b-5: rig sngags grub pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'dir yang bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205b-18: rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyi mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205b-22: bsgoms pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po gsang ba dam pa bsgrag cing brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205b-24: mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205b-25: phyag dpung pa'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'od zer 'phro ba du ma'i phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:205b-26: spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyangs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor bzhag nas klad pa la byugs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206a-0: sems can dag pa dam pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod smros @206a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206a-3: ngas kyang da ltar byin gyis rlob kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206a-4: khyod gsang ba dam pa'i dam tshig smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206a-5: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206a-6: gangg'a'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po de kho na nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206a-9: ma h'a aa mo gha p'a sh'a s'a dha ya sa ma ya hri da ya tsa ra tsa ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206a-10: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po ta la 'di brag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206a-13: rtsva shing du bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-0: khor yug chen po dang @206b bcas pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos shing lha'i gnas rnams kyang ldeg par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-4: srin po'i gnas rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-5: rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'khrug par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-6: chu gter rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-7: de ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-8: 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-9: rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-10: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba'i snying po bklags pas 'grub pa bla na med pa smras pa legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-13: khyod kyis gsang ba bklag pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-14: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-16: gsang ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas gangg'a'i klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang ste spyi bo la bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:206b-17: gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la sngon bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-2: de bzhin du gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-4: sems can gdug pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-5: phas kyi rgol ba rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-6: mi mdza' ba rnams 'jigs par bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-8: rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin blta 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-9: rig sngags 'di'i cho ga sgrub pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-11: rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas shin tu gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-13: snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-14: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o; ;me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-21: tshes bco lnga la sgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi'o; ;ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du thog mar skyil mo krung bcas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-22: tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te chab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-23: yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207a-24: phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-0: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gdon @207b par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-3: phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-4: de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-5: bzlas brjod bton pa tsam gyis de'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-6: bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa yang g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-8: don yod pa'i zhags pa lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang snying dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-13: legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-14: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-15: de nas dgos pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-16: las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:207b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa sa ya bye ba brgya stong gang'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spyi gtsug tu 'jog par rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208a-1: phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag pas dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus rang bzhin gyi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro; ;mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208a-2: rnam pa thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208a-3: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208a-4: ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar du yongs su skyong bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa na khang pa brtsegs pa legs par brgyan pa'i sengge'i khri'i mchog la 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i skus bzhugs shing chos ston pa blta bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208a-7: rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208a-8: cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la byams pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208a-9: snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la ci 'byor ba @208b me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-8: ba dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-9: tshes brgyad nas tshes bcu gsum gyi bar du zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-10: ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-11: tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-12: nye ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-14: yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-18: gu gul gyi me tog khu ba dang bcas pa gla rtsi dang lhan cig bsres nas blang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-19: dgug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-20: don yod khams gsum rnam par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-21: bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:208b-22: gang phyir bdug pa tsam gyis ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:214b-9: lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:214b-13: sgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:214b-14: sgrub pa thams cad la bsgrub par bgyi zhing las thams ccad la dus thams ccad du bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:214b-15: aom aa mo gha bi ma le dzi hv'a gra sam sho dha ni padma ka ma la dzi hv'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:214b-16: lce spyang ba'i gsang sngags te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:214b-18: padma dang ku mu da'i 'dab ma dang 'dra bar lce mnyen par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:214b-21: mgul pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215a-0: @215a *// gla rtsi lhan cig blang ba bgyis la phye ma zhib mor btags nas ril bu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshad du sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar la gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te zangs kyi snod du stsal nas bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe khar stsal nas skad cig tsam zhig bsdad pa bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215a-1: rtag tu kha nas autpa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215a-2: rgyang grags tsam du the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215a-6: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215a-13: de bzhin du 'jig myur du ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215b-14: brjed byed 'byung po gsang ba pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215b-18: dus kun tu ni mkhas pas 'gyur //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215b-20: thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215b-22: ril bu 'di ni bcang bgyis na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215b-23: don yod padma dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215b-25: aom ma la bi ga te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215b-28: aa mo gha singhe sho dha ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215b-29: n'a ga pus pa'i shun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:215b-38: pra pu na da ri ka dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:216a-1: tu btags nas gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas char pa'i chab dang bsres pas khrus bgyis shing 'tshal ba'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:216a-6: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:216a-8: bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:216a-12: gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:216a-26: lha yi tsandan dri dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:216a-27: mda' rgyang gang du som nyi med //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:216b-16: thog mar lus sbyang cho ga bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:216b-17: de nas gsang sngags legs par spyod //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:218b-22: chab la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas rang gi lus la dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:218b-23: aom aa mo gha sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:218b-24: ma h'a padme tishtha tishthi h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:218b-25: dam tshig gi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:218b-27: aom sarb'a tra aa mo gha ba ba ti tishtha raksha tu h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:218b-28: slob ma dang grogs bgyid pa bsrung ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:218b-29: thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas dpral bar thig le bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:218b-30: aom tree lokya padma aa mo gha kra ma ne mi li mi li sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:218b-32: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-0: @219a *// aom padme ma h'a padme sa ra sa ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-1: sa mante na pa ri bashd'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-2: aa mo gha p'a she na su ru su ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-3: tshon skud sna lnga la lan bdun bzlas te dkri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-4: aom bi tsi tra aa mo gha bst'a na ram ga bi shuddha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-6: ba dan gyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-8: aom aa mo gha sha ra badzra tunda tha ra tha ra sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-11: aom bi pu la aa mo gha ma h'a dha ra bi shudhe si ri si ri sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-12: rta babs kyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-13: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-14: su dag der zhugs nas mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-15: sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-16: aom n'a n'a bi tsi ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-18: pha la t'a k'i rna p'u ra ya pa ra pa ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-19: bum pa gang ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-21: aom aa mo gha ratna bi ma na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-23: aa drishta bi bya gandho dzva la spha ra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-24: sa mante na dzva la dzva la sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-25: pog phor gyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-29: si ri ni tu ti tu ti sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-30: gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-32: aom di bya bham dza na aa mo gha padma ba re p'u ra ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-33: kham phor gyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-35: aom aa mo gha sam pu ra ni dro na gandha pa ti sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219a-38: aom sa ra ni s'a ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-0: aa mo gha bha dza ne @219b m'a da ne h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-1: ril ba mgrin ring gi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-4: ratna kumbha ba ti s'a ga ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-8: aom bi tsi tro dzva la n'a na ram ga bhi bhakta ya sam sho dha ya tu ti sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-11: aom di bya aa wa lo ki ni bi bha dza yam tu sa mante na sa ma ra na sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-12: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so sor dbye bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-13: aom na n'a pra h'a ra na aa mo gha mu dr'a dzva la dzva la sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-16: aom aa mo gha ratna su tra dha re ki ni ki ni sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-17: thig skud kyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-18: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil 'khor ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-19: ri mo bri ba'i ras sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-20: gzhan gzhi ci yang rung ba la yang gdab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-21: aom bi pu la ba re bra be sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-23: sgo'i cha bye ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-24: sgo re rer yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-25: aom su bhi bhakti su mam ga la dra ra b'a banti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-26: aom di bya bha dza na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-27: aa mo gha p'a sha na ba re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-29: aom sam b'u rna ru phyid bya ba dza ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-30: aom mo gha padme sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-32: aom bi bi dha r'u pa h'a ro ba ksha ra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-34: aa mo gha ba ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-35: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-36: aom di bya gandha nu sa ra ni aa mo gha ba le dha ra dha ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-37: mchod yon gyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:219b-39: aom gandha spha ra ni sa manta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-0: @220a *// aa mo gha pra sphu ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-3: aom ni rma la k'a ya sho dha ni di bya gandha pra bu ra ni p'u ra ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-6: aom ghandha ts'u rna pra p'u ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-7: tsu ru tsu ru sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-8: dri'i phye ma'i gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-11: bi ma le ganbho tta re sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-14: aom di bya gandha pra p'u ra ni s'a ga ra dza la di bya aa dhi shthi te ka la sho dha ra p'u rna p'u ra ya dza ya siddhe sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-15: bum pa'i dri chab kyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-17: aom ra sa s'a gra pa ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-18: sarbba bi dha aa dhishtha na aa dhi shthi te sam p'u ra ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-19: gtor ma ro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-20: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-21: aom di bya bho dza na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-23: bi pu la pra bhe sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-24: kha zas kyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-25: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-26: aom tri shu kla bho dza na ba li bi p'u la ra s'a gra ba ti su ra pra su ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-27: zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-28: gtor ma gzhan la yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-29: aom pha la ba ti sv'a ra ba ti di bya ba na spa ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-30: ta ra ta ra tu ni sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-33: aom di bya ku su motpa la n'a n'a bushpa pra barsha ni bha ba sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220a-34: me tog gi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-0: aom bi bi dha la ta pushp'a pa kunthi ta ba na spa ti aa ha ra sam @220b p'u rna kum bhe sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-1: me tog gtor ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-3: aom ma h'a dhu pa me gha pa ta la sanytsa d'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-6: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-7: aom aa tha ra pa ni dzva la dzva la de ba mu khe sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-10: aom bhi bi dha ma ni kan ka ratno dzva la pushmi ma ni aa mo gha ma ni sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-11: cha zhing rgyan pa'i gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-13: aom padma ka re bi ma lan kha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-15: sa ma sa ma sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa dhishthi te sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-16: thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-17: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-18: aom sarba gu na pra na ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-19: shi ro bandha n'a ya na maska ro mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-20: mi li mi li tu ri ni sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-21: phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-23: aom da sha di sha aa bhi bandha na pra sa ra hu h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-25: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-26: aom bi bi dha yu dha dzva li ta pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-27: pra dzva la pra sphu ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-29: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-30: aom di bya aa mo gha bi pu la sva re ma dhu ra ni ra gho sha ru te na ra na ra na h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-33: yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-34: aom rashmi dzva la sa mante na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:220b-35: aa ba bhva sa ya ma h'a ma ni ratna shi khe sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-0: aom dhu ru dhu ru aa pa ha ya sh'i gha dza be h'um dgug pa'i @221a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-2: gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-3: aom dushtha sa do bi bo dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-4: sa ma sa ma ya ba re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-5: dam tshig gi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-6: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-7: aom bi tsi tra ma ni bi bu la brta ni h'um//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-8: bgrang phreng gi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-10: aom bi tsi tra ra dzva lo di bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-11: ku su ma ba re pushpa ra ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-12: me tog phreng ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-14: aom di bya lo tsa ne aa mo gha pra ba re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-15: sarba di bya aa dhi shthi ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-16: siddhi sho dhe bi lo ki te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-18: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-19: aom aa mo gha padme sa manta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-20: shu bha ne ta ra ta ra gatstsha sva bha ba na ma sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-21: slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-22: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-23: aom di bya sam p'u ra ni n'a gabi lo ki na h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-24: mkhar gsil gyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-25: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-26: aom badta spu ra ni spu ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-27: aa mo gha bi ta sa manta pra bhe sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-28: lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-29: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-30: aom dur bha sam stha ra biddhya aa tishthi ta pra sa ra su ra su ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-31: ri ship'u dzi te sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-32: rtsa gding ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-33: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-34: aom dzva la du ma dzva la shi khi rashmi garbhe sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-35: sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221a-36: lan brgya rtsa rtsa brgyad bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-0: aom padme ni padma @221b sa ne ba re n'a ga bhu ba ne sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-4: aom kha ga tsa ri ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-5: ga ma ga ma ya pa da pra tsa ri ni h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-8: aom sarba tra aa mo gha bhi shi ka ma h'a ts'u da bi ma le aa bhi shinytsi tu ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-9: pra ba ra p'a ni bhu dze padme dha dze sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-10: dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-11: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-12: rig sngags 'chang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so sor cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas cho ga bsgrubs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-13: dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-19: rin po che'i snod sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-20: nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-23: ba dan sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-24: ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-25: ro sna tshogs kyi mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-26: gtor ma bzang po rnams pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-27: ji tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-28: byang chub sems dpa'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:221b-29: lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-6: lto 'phye chen po rnams la so so'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-7: mi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-8: kha zas kyi mchog ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-10: dgos pa'i rnam pa thams cad bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-11: de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-13: gsang sngags sgrub pa rnams bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-14: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-15: gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-16: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-17: re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-21: yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222a-27: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-0: rig @222b sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-1: de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub pa'i grub pa stsol bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-2: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'jig rten pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-4: shin tu rgya che zhing bag tshad ba ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-6: bkur sti chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-9: som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi zhing dngos po gzhan du yang yid la mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-10: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-11: snying rje dang dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-12: btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-13: bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-17: snying rje'i lhag par bsam pas dmigs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-18: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:222b-19: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-3: 'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas mngon sum du bsgom par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rim mo'i gzugs la phyag rgya bgyis te mdun du rtsva'i gding ba gting na skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pa bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-6: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-7: de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-8: dbang la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-9: 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-10: sems can dag pa lag na padma can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-11: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-12: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs kun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-13: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-14: srin po lha min gsang ba pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-15: 'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-16: drag po khyab 'jug gzhon nu sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-17: gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-18: drang srong tshogs dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-19: zla nyi kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-20: de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223a-21: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-1: de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-2: mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-3: de bzhin padma gar gyi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-4: rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-5: lcags sgrog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-6: lha mo khro gnyer m'a ma k'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-7: dpe med pho nya mo dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-8: 'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-10: padma'i so can de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-11: ti se yi ni rtse mo na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-13: de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-14: mthu chen ji bzhin rig 'dzin dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-15: rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-16: bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-17: sum cu gnyis nas lha dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-18: gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-20: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-21: de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-22: rtag tu mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-23: phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzin pa la blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-24: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-25: bram ze'i cha lugs don yod zhags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-26: mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-27: mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-28: de bzhin rgya mtsho'i klong dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:223b-29: mgon po'i zhal ni bcu gcig dag //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-3: de bzhin gzigs pa bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-4: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-6: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-7: mgon po thams cad ston par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-8: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-11: mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-12: gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhing ni stong dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-13: chu bo gangga'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-14: de bzhin gshegs 'bum bye ba brgya phrag stong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-16: phyag rgya bcing pa tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-17: mthong ba chen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-18: nyin gcig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-19: chos kyi 'khro lo de bzhin rdo rje'i gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-20: de dag rmi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-21: de la yid gnyis som nyi the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-22: sangs rgyas rnams kyis gshung ba'am mtshams med lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-23: mgon po che la gdug sems nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-24: byang chub sems dpa' bar chad 'phags pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-25: kha zer nyid dang dam chos bslu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-26: rgyal ba'i gsung spong mnar med gzhol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224a-27: mi bzad dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-0: bskal pa 'bum mo @224b thams cad skad cig grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-1: phyag rgyal gsang sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-2: thos sam mthong ngam ming ni bzung bas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-3: sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-4: don yod zhags snying phyag rgya mthong ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-5: 'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-6: sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gangga yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-7: bye ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-8: byang chub snying por gtogs pa thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-9: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-10: don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-11: gsang sngags mthong nas bsod nams phung chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-12: bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-13: de yi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-14: de ni dpag tu med par som nyi med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-15: de nas rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-16: gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas ni thog mar yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-17: yo byad sgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-18: rtag tu yan lag spos ni sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-19: sna tshogs bdug pas rab tu bdugs bgyis shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-20: dpung pa lag pa lha yi spos kyis byug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-21: gtsang ma'i sa phyogs gtsang ma'i stan bshams par /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-22: skyil mo krung bcas nas ni byams sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-23: snying rje'i lhag bsam de nyid mnyam bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:224b-24: phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-0: rtag tu 'jig rten dbang la phyag bgyi @225a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-2: rtag tu bla ma mchod nas chos la brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-3: shin tu rig pa tshig gzhan mi smra bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-4: shin ti rig pas srung ba'i cho ga bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-5: shin tu bkra shis bla ma de nyid gus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-6: bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-7: sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-8: lhan cig rjes mthun gyur nas de nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-9: phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-10: lag pa padma'i tshul du bzhag la sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings te mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du snying gar gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-12: don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-13: byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-14: mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-15: aom aa mo gha bi ku ra bi ta sa manta aa wa lo ka ya na mastree ya dhv'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-16: aa dhi shthi ta aa mo ghra pa padme /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-17: tsa ra bi tsa ra sanytsa h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225a-18: de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par blta ba don yod pa'i rgyal po padma 'bar ba gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal pos shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag cher g-yos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225b-0: dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'bum @225b phrag brgya stong du ma dag byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos phyag gsar gyi kha dog lta bu brkyangs nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225b-1: grub pa dam pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225b-10: kun 'gyed gzhon nu la sogs pa lha rnams srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225b-13: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225b-16: chad pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225b-17: de'i grub pa yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225b-18: las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225b-19: don yod dam tshig mchog grags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225b-20: padma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225b-21: mdzub mo gung mo rnams padma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyid la sen mo mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan te rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor rtse ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:225b-22: aom aa mo gha padmam ku sha sa man y'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-2: bcings ma thag tu'am bzlas pa tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-3: zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-8: thugs dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-9: rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying po grub pa dam pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-10: yang nas yang du mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-11: mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-12: don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-14: gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-15: thams cad du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-17: thams cad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226a-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-0: lag mthil padma ltar bgyis la mdzub mo gung mo rdo rje ltar @226b bgyi zhing mthe'u chung brkyang pa'i phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-2: me tog la sogs dri rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-3: phreng ba byug pa phye ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-4: ba dan gos dang rgyan dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-5: gtor ma mchod yon rab tu dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-6: bum pa gang ba'i dri sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-7: tshon skud sna lnga tshon phye 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-8: gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-9: phyag rgya 'di ni kun la mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-10: 'di ni dngul ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-11: thams cad du ni don yod mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-12: go bar bgyid pa'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-13: padma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-14: gung mor nor bu dkris pa lta bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni; bag tsha ba med pa'i padma rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-16: grub pa dam pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-17: spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-18: aom aa mo gha padma ma h'a satva aa ya tu mi ha manda le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-19: bi ri bi ri padma bhu dze sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-20: dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-21: gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-22: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-23: phyag na padma gsol gdab dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-24: lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-26: phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-27: phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-28: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang 'du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-29: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-30: dri za lha min de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-31: nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:226b-32: lto 'phye chen po nyid dag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-2: bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-3: lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag la lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnams padma'i mtshams su bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-4: gung mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-5: grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcings dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-6: dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyi ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-7: srung ba'i las la bag tsha med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-8: phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-9: gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-10: dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-11: mtshams bcings dkyil 'khor bcings pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-12: srung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-13: aom aa mo gha badzra dri dha padma bandha sa mante na ma h'a sa manta raksha tnu mam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-14: tsu ru tsu ru h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-15: de nas don yod phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-16: grub ldan sems can kun smra na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-17: don yod pa yi phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-18: khyad par 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-19: rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sor mo rnams mnyam par bzhag ste srin lag kha gdengs la sor mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-20: don yod sna tshogs rgyal po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-21: padma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-22: phyag rgya 'di ni las kun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-23: 'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-24: dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-25: phyag rgya 'di ni bzung tsam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227a-26: gsang sngags dam pa bsrungs bgyis na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-0: @227b dus gsum gshegs pa rnam thar pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-3: aa dhi shthi te padmo bi shva r'u pa dha re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-5: pra be sha tu stree ya dho nu ga ta na dha ri tu ti sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-6: phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-7: de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-8: sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam drug tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-9: g-yo bar 'gyur bar so ma nyi med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-13: rtag tu blta shing mdun na mchos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-14: sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-16: sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-17: gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-18: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas sgo na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-19: gnas pa thams cad sgo 'byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-20: bde chen 'jig rten khams dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-21: sgo na gnas pa sgo 'byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-22: phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-24: phyag rgya sdig pa thams cad 'phrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-25: nye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-26: sdug bsngal kun las rnam par gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-27: gnod pa thams cad 'jigs par bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-28: dmyal ba bcu drug rnams las thar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-29: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-30: mi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-31: nyes byas thams cad 'jig par bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:227b-32: dmyal ba'i sgo ni bcad par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-2: mtshams med lnga ni bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-3: sdig pa kun las rnam par thar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-4: sems can kun la rtag tu sdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-5: de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-6: phyag rgya 'di nyid mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste gung mo padma'i ral ba'i tshul du bgyis te spyi bo'i ral ba sa la bzhag pa ni; padma'i ral ba'i phyag rgya lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-8: don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bsgrags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-9: sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-10: aom aa mo gha padmo dza le bi sho dha ya h'um bi ri bi ri bi ma le sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-11: phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas chab dag gis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-12: bkrus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-13: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-14: phyag rgya gsang sngags dogs med pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-15: rtag tu bkrus pa'i mod tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-16: mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-17: mi gtsang spyod pa gzang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-18: tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-19: mi thub pa ni thub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-20: bsod nams phung po lha bzhin 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-21: zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-22: 'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-23: gsang sngags bla na med pa 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228a-24: grub pa don yod zhags pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-0: bsrung ba'i phyir ni so ma nyi @228b med; ;mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-1: sems dpa' mchog sbyin dag pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-2: mchog sbyin rgyun du thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-3: nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-5: de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-6: thams cad du ni las 'grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-7: gnod pa kun las rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-8: sdig pa kun las rnam par thar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-9: thams cad du ni bkra shis mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-10: khrus kyi rnam pa 'di dag no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-11: don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-12: lag gnyis bsdams la 'og tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-13: srin lag gnyis yid tsam bskums pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-14: padma'i nor bu phyag rgya lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-15: kun nas kyang ni mnyam par bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-17: skyil mo krung bcas mchis nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-18: phyag rgya 'di dag bcings bgyis shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-19: mnyam par bzhag nas gsang sngags bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-20: bcings pa tsam gyi mod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-21: skyil krung rdo rje lhun mnyam 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-22: kun nas go char gyur nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-23: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-24: gnod sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-25: lha min mkha' lding gis mi mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-26: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-27: de dag thams cad rgyang ring 'bros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-28: bgegs med par ni las 'grub pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-29: bzlas pa'i las la som nyi med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:228b-30: aom aa mo gha badzra dri dha padme shva ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-0: thal mo mnyam par sbyar la mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug nas mthe @229a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-1: bong padma kha phye ba ltar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-2: don yod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-5: aom padme shva ra aa mo gha ba ra da /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-6: bhi ri bhi ri sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-7: 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-8: de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid sems pa'i bsam ba rtse gcig pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-9: lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum du rgyun du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa g-yo bar 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rig sngags 'chang de la legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-11: zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-13: rig sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-14: mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-15: 'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-16: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229a-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-0: de @229b bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-2: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-3: phyag rgya 'di bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la yon tan dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-4: bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings nas zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-9: bzlas brjod kyi dam pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-10: zhes dpung pa g-yas pa brkyang ba'i lag pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-12: gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-13: khyod rjes su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs pas nga'i bu rig sngags 'chang gi thu bor gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-15: khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub pas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par dbye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-16: cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po la brtan par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:229b-17: snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la goms par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-1: nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-2: khyod padma'i nang du brdzus te skyes nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-3: 'di ltar tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-4: phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-5: lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-6: don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-7: rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-8: tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-9: don yod rgya cher snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-10: rdzu 'phrul gang gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dpung pa bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis mchi zhing slar ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-11: bzlas brjod brgya stong bgyis la phyag rgya brgya stong bcings na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230a-12: tshe 'di nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230b-0: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin @230b gyis rnam par rol ba'i don yod pa'i mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230b-12: lus ngan la sogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230b-13: klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230b-14: ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230b-16: 'jig rten pa'i bzlas brjod sgrub pa 'bum lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230b-17: 'bum bzlas pas 'jig rten las bzlas pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du snang ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230b-19: byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du phyir mi ldog par byin gyis brlabs bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230b-20: phyag rgya bcings te skyil mo krung bcas nas sems can thams cad la brtse ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230b-21: 'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:230b-22: bzlas brjod bgyis ma thag kho nar lan drug brgya bzhi bcur bzlas brjod par bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-1: gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dran pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-3: gzi brjid lus la 'jug par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-4: bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-5: ri mo'i sku gzugs de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-6: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-7: mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-8: de'i las gyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-9: sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba dang gtugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-10: nad thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-11: 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa rnams kyi dam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-12: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-14: thal mo lhan cig bsdams te sbyar la rtse mo yid tsam bkug ste khar gtad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-15: srin lag gnyis phyir 'gyed cing gung mo padma lta bur bgyis te sngags 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-16: aom tu ru tu ru padme aa mo gha siddhi h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-17: phyag rgya 'di ni don yod grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-18: las rnams grub dang ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231a-19: 'di ni bcing ba bgyis pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-1: myur du ston pa stsol 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-2: rnyed dka' don yod grub pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-3: mchog kun rab tu stob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-4: 'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin 'jig rten pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-5: sgrib pa thams cad las ni rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-6: bsod nams phung po dag ni rtag tu 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-7: bkra shis sgra ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-8: lha rnams rtag tu srung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-9: rdo rje bcing ba shin tu bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-10: rtag tu sems ni brtan por bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-11: mdzub mo dag ni yid bskums nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-12: snying ga dag tu rab tu brkyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-13: don yod pa'i padma'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-15: padma'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya las dang don thams cad 'grub pa'i gsang sngags de dag gsungs nas de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-16: aom aa mo gha hri da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-17: padme dha ra dha ra padma dha ra ma h'a manda la hri da ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-18: snying po phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-19: padma 'chang ba'i don yod snying po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-20: grub pa de nyid yang dag som nyi med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-21: thams cad du ni las rnams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-22: de ni grub par 'gyur te som nyi med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-23: shin tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:231b-24: shin tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags bzlas //
