K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250a-16: khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la phug gi sgo rang 'bye bar 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250a-17: ji ltar dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dra bar mthong na ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250a-18: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250b-0: ji @250b ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin du rig sngags 'chang 'di yang mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250b-2: bla mas bla mar bgyi ba de lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250b-3: gang du bcud kyis len mchog 'dis reg na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250b-4: 'dzam bu chu bo gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250b-13: de dag thams cad 'dzam bu'i gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ba nas dgos pa'i bar du 'gyur ro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250b-14: de nas rig sngags 'chang klu mo'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250b-17: rig sngags 'chang de gos gtsang ma bgos nas legs par khrus bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250b-20: bco lnga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyis nas nyin zhag gcig gnas par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250b-21: 'khor lo'i zhags pa chen po 'di chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa'i stan bzang po'i steng du gzhag par bgyi zhing mchod pa chen po bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250b-22: de nyid kyi mdun du tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re nas bzlas brjod bgyis pa zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:250b-23: lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251a-0: zhags pa de yang sbrul bzhin du yongs su 'khyil la 'khor tlo'i gdengs ka'i tshul du @251a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251a-2: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blangs te klu gnas pa'i mtsho'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251a-4: lha mo gnas pa'i mtsho 'gram du mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te gnas kyi nang du zhags pa 'phang par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251a-5: 'phangs ma thag kho nar slar yang dran par bgyi ste; ji lta bu'i don yid la bsam pa'i don de zhags pas bcings nas ji ltar bsam pa de bzhin du bgyi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251a-6: gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bsam pa'i nor ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251a-19: gzhan yang gzhal med khang ji lta bur 'byor ba can dag don du gnyer na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251a-21: de thams cad 'dren par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251a-22: gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de dang der ji ltar yid la bsam pa de nyid shin tu gsal bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251a-23: dngos po gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251a-27: rje'u rigs kyis ci dang ci bsam pa 'grub par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251b-0: bu mo'i ming nas brjod @251b de zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pas bcings nas 'dren par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251b-6: ma he yang 'dren par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251b-7: gang gi mid nas brjod de g-yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'phangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251b-8: de yang zhags pas bcings nas mdun du mchis te ji ltar yid la bsam pa de bzhin du thams cad 'grub par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251b-9: zla ba dang nyi ma dbab par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251b-10: zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdun du mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te zla ba dang nyi ma'i mngon sum du zhags pa 'phangs nas slar yang drang bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251b-11: zla ba dang nyi ma zhags pas bcings nas drangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251b-12: nam mkha' las babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251b-13: 'on te zla ba dang nyi ma'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251b-14: zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa lag pas blangs te don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:251b-15: rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phur nas nyi ma dang zla ba'i stan la ji srid du 'tshal bar longs spyod par 'gyur zhing slar bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252a-0: gtsang ma legs par khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang @252a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252a-1: bgo bar bgyi zhing nags khung gi sgor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252a-2: lag pas zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyis nags khung gi gnas kyi gzhal med khang gi klu thams cad bcings nas thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252a-3: rig sngags 'chang la phyag bgyis nas rig sngags 'chang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252a-4: khyod gnas chen po mchog tu zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252a-5: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas te lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nags khung du 'jug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252a-6: zhugs pa tsam kho nas nags kyi gnas rnam par drug tu g-yo bar 'gyur zhing dbus kyi nags kyi mtha' na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing lha'i chab dvangs shing rnyog pa ma mchis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252a-8: lha'i tsandan gyi dri dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252a-13: bdud rtsi'i bcud can mchis te 'di ltar don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rdzing gi dbus su zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-0: 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bud med rin po che'i gzugs 'dra ba'i lha'i bu mo'i lus phyed byung nas lha'i @252b me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-1: rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa gang ba thogs to rig sngags 'chang la dbul zhing spyi bo smad de 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rig sngags 'chang la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-3: khyod ma bzhengs par gnas su zhugs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-4: rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i tshig gsum brjod par bgyi ste; 'jig rten pha rol gyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-6: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-9: mngag gzhug ma zhes gar bde bar brjod la de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-11: kho bo la 'jig rten pha rol gyi don byin cig ces 'jug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-13: khyod rang gi gnas su snoms te zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-14: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas 'jug par bgyi zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-15: don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-16: de nas gnas chen po mchog rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang lha'i dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:252b-18: gos dbyangs pa dar gyi chun 'phyang rab tu dpyangs par gda' ba nas bu mo de yang nor bu rin po che chen po thogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253a-0: 'jig rten pha rol gyi don du rin po che chen po bzhes shig ces dbul bar @253a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253a-2: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis stan bshams pa'i steng du zhags pa legs par yongs su bskyil te stan du bting la nor bu rin po che chen po de zhags pa'i steng du bzhag cing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253a-3: don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253a-4: bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pa nor bu rin po che dang bcas te 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253a-5: nor bu rin po che chen po de las kyang 'o ma'i chab 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253a-6: rig sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i chab de las blangs la skyor chu lan bdun du reg par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253a-7: 'o ma'i chab kyis reg pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253a-8: don yod snang ba nor bu gzhal med khang gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'od zer zhes bgyi ba thob nas sa bcu la gnas te phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253a-9: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253a-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin sgyu ma lta bur rnam par 'phrul pa thob par 'gyur shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-0: shin tu yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis nas lag pa g-yas pa spyi bor bzhag ste nga'i rig @253b sngags 'chang gi bu thu bo khyod kyis grol ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su dag pa 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-2: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong nas thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-3: sems dpa' chen po legs so legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-4: khyod ni byang chub lam du zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-5: khyod kyis sangs rgyas nyid 'thob ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-6: sgrol ba'i lam zhes bya ba bsgrubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-7: 'on te rig sngags 'chang nyid don du gnyer na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-8: de'i tshe gser gyi me tog stsol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-9: blangs la bu mo de nyid kyi spyi bor bzhag nas aom zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-10: aom zhes bgyi ba'i sgra brjod nas spyi bor bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la bu mo de'i mig mchog gnyis nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-11: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis blangs te nye reg bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-12: sgra cung zad 'khyil cing lag pa na 'khor lo'i zhags pa thogs te nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-13: rig sngags 'chang bye ba 'bum phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro; ;tshe lo drug khri nyis stong du 'gyur zhing skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:253b-14: 'on te gsang sngags 'chang 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga s'ong na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-2: rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi skra 'di sdoms shig ces de'i tshe bud med des skra'i ral pa bton nas rig sngags 'chang la 'bul pa na skra thams cad blangs te dum bu gsum du bkug nas srad bu la nyi shu rtsa gcig bkal te mgo la btags pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-3: ji ltar yid la bsam pa de bzhin du mig 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-4: 'bras bu dang me tog 'tshal ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-5: bden pa ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-7: mi gda' bar gyur nas gnod sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-13: mi ma yin pa rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro; ;dpral ba la btags pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-14: lha dang klu thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-15: dpung pa g-yas pa la btags pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-16: glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-19: gdug pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pas stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-20: dpung pa g-yon pa la btags pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-21: rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254a-22: lag pa g-yon pa la btags pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-0: gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing @254b bdag gi nor du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-1: lag pa g-yas pa la btags pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-2: grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i sgo la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-3: rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-10: bu mo dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-11: nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-12: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa bya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-16: gzhan yang gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-17: bral g-yas pa la btags pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-23: bsti gnas gang du zhugs te zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la nor thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-25: lha thams cad rang gi gzugs su mngon nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-27: rkang pa g-yas pa la btags pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-28: rgya mtsho chen po'i pha mthar yang rgal bar 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-29: chu klung chen po'i chab kyis byin pa nub tsam du 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-30: byin pa g-yon pa la btags bas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:254b-31: nyi ma re re zhing dpag tshad brgyar phyin nas dub pa ma mchis par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-0: brla g-yon pa la btags nas dur khrod @255a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-2: dur khrod thams cad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-3: de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas de nyid na spyod na rig sngags 'chang des lag pa g-yon pas bum pa gang ba bzung zhing lag pa g-yas pas bud med de bzung nas gnas chen po'i mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-4: gnas mchog de'i dbus na rdzing me tog gis chal bar bkram pa bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-5: rdzing der gnyis ka khrus bgyi zhing chab kyis nye reg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-6: bkrus shing lag pa tsam kho nas 'khor lo rig sngags 'chang zhags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-8: rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bdun stong gis yongs su bskor cing tshe bskal pa khrir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-9: skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-10: nags kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi dpon po rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-11: gal te ma zhes bgyi bas don du gnyer ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-12: bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-21: dngul yongs su grub par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255a-22: srong mo zhes bgyi bas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-0: dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshang bar stobs par 'gyur zhing yan @255b lag spong bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-1: nyi ma re re zhing rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid de mchi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-2: lha'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa stobs par bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-4: gzhal med khang stob par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-5: mngag gzhug ma zhes bgyi bas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-6: gang dang gang du mngags pa de dang der mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-12: gzhan yang mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la bsam pa bzhin du bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-14: de nas rig sngags 'chang thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-15: gtsang ma khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-16: gnas dben pa gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis la dri sna tshogs kyis byug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-17: ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma bshams la aa ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te nub gsum du mchis nas 'khor lo zhags pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgyas don yod rgyal po'i snying po'i bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis te lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas du ba 'byung bar 'gyur; khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:255b-19: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas skyes pa nag po chen po'i tshul mi sdug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-5: dpung pa mkhrang zhing brtan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-6: gsus pa 'phyangs po mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-9: stag gi sham thabs bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-11: dril bu thogs pa zhig lus phyed tsam byung nas phyogs bcur lta bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-12: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-13: brtan par bgyi la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas 'khor lo'i zhags pa 'phangs te mgo bcad la khrag mang du byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-14: rig sngags 'chang gis khrag des lus thams cad byug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-15: byugs pa tsam gyi mod la bdag nyid lus mi chod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-16: mi shigs pas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-17: mig gnyis phyung la rang gi mig phyis nas mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-20: tshe bskal pa bcur 'gyur zhing thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtshor 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-21: bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i skye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-25: khrag gis snying gar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-27: ral grir gyur nas dgra thams cad bklag par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256a-28: gal te thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-0: de'i tshe @256b khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad zhags pa dang 'khor lo la bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-1: 'khor los zhags pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis thal mo sa la brdab par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-2: lan gsum du thal mo brdabs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-3: de'i 'og tu thang gi sgo dbye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-4: ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-5: zhugs nas slar yang mchi zhing dgos pa gzhan thams cad bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-6: thang thams cad la gnas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-7: 'on te nam mkha' la mchi 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-8: gyen du bltas nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po yungs mar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-9: lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag nyid la byugs te lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha' go 'byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-10: lha'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-11: lha'i khyim du mchis nas zhags pas lha'i mgul nas bcing bar bgyi zhing don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lha bcings pa gang lags pa de'i ming nas brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-12: lha de babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-15: dbang phyug chen po rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-16: ci zhig don du gnyer ba de snoms shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:256b-17: rig sngags 'chang gis lha'i gnas su 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-2: gal te gzhan bsam pa zhig mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-3: mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-4: de nas lha'i gnas nas mchi ba na lha'i gnas lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lag pa na thogs te nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-5: ji srid 'tshal bar lha'i gzhal med khang chen por longs spyod par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-7: lha'i gnas nas slar yang 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-8: gzhan ji ltar rang gi blo gros dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-9: yid la bsam pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-11: yid gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-12: 'khor lo'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-13: de nas rig sngags 'chang padma'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal pas rig sngags 'chang de gtsang ma legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-16: nub gcig mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa'i skud pa bsgrub par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-17: ras kyi skud pa'am padma'i skud pa bee d'urya'i kha dog lta bur tshon gyis kha bsgyur bar bgyi zhing khru nyi shu rtsa gcig bkal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257a-18: de la yang padma bgyis te rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab ma kha phye ba sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyis padma gser gyi 'dab ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-3: rin po che ka ti ka las bgyi zhing mu tig gis bskor ba bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-4: de nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-5: zhags pa'i thor to gcig la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-6: padma'i phyag rgya gdags par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-7: de nas legs par brgyan pa'i chos kyi stan bzang po bsham par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-8: ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dri'i padma bsam par bgyi zhing dkyil 'khor gyi steng du chos kyi gdan bshams la bum pa gad bas brgyan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-9: me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing aa ga ru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-11: du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-12: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil gyi snod kyang gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-13: padma'i zhags pa de yang chos kyi stan gyi steng du gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-14: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krung bcas nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan khri bzlas te bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas de'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-15: lan khri rdzogs nas de nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nub mo mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-16: zhags pa de la yang mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:257b-17: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-0: de nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas @258a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-1: te nyin mtshan dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-3: de nas padma'i zhags pa 'bar zhing kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-4: legs so legs so zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus la kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-6: de nas rig sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i skyil mo krung gis mchis nas mig mi 'dzum zhing bzhin 'dzum pas snying rje chen po yid la bsgom par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du bltas te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan sum stong bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-8: de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi lha'i rang bzhin mdun du mchis nas lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-9: 'di skad ces kyang dbugs 'byin par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-11: nga'i bu snying las skyes pa'i thu bo bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-12: mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis nga la mchod pa'i mchog byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-15: khyod kyis don yod rgyal po'i snying po grub cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258a-16: khyod kyis padma'i zhags pa chen po grub kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-0: ji @258b ltar yid la bsam [?] pa bzhin du mchog khyer cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-1: khyod yid kyi brnag pa thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-3: khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rgyu ba las ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-8: 'chi ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las thar na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-9: khyod dmyal ba chen po mi bzad pa bcu drug las ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-11: 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba brgyad las ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-13: 'di nas phyi ma'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa las shi 'phos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-15: khyod byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du padma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-16: khyod kyis gangg'a'i klung 'bum phrag stong brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i snyed kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-19: khyod kyis lhag par bya ba mang po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-20: byas; khyod rig sngags 'chang chen por ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-22: dmyal ba dang sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa thams cad las ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-24: ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin mchog khyer cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:258b-25: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259a-0: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis padma'i zhags pa de blangs te gnas @259a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259a-1: gtsang mar gus pas mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259a-2: nam dgos pa de'i zhags pa blang par bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259a-3: las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259a-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa g-yon par bzhag la lag pa g-yas pas zhags pa bzung ste don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sems can nam lha gang gi ming nas brjod de bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259a-6: byang chub sems dpa' mdun du mchis nas 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad stsol par 'gyur ro; ;de nas rig sngags 'chang byang chub tu lung bstan pa don du gnyer bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259a-7: rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas legs par khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bgos pas nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas padma'i zhags pa de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259a-8: zhags pa'i thor to ya gcig gis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259a-9: rang gi mgul du btags la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259a-10: don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259a-11: stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gser gyi mdog can rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor @259b phyag bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-2: yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-4: sdig pa che rabs stong du bsags pa thams cad gtugs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-5: lhag ma ma lus par gtugs par gyur nas lus yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-6: dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-8: de nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar bgyis nas sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro; ;mchod par 'os pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-9: bla ma'i gnas su yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-10: nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-11: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-12: 'gum pa'i dus su phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-14: legs pa'i lam ston par mdzad par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun na mchis nas dbugs 'byin par bgyid cing lag pa g-yas pa spyi bor 'jog par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-16: de bde bas shin tu dran pa nye bar bzhag nas lus 'dor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-17: bor ba tsam gyi mod la skal pa mnyam pa bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:259b-18: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-0: mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras @260a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-1: pa'i lus padma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-3: bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-4: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par g-yar ton du bgyis nas sa bcu la gnas shing phyin ci log tu ma gyur pas phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-5: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-6: cho 'phrul chen po la lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-9: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-10: de nas rig sngags 'chang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba'i chos kho na la lta bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-11: rig sngags 'chang gis gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs sam; gnas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-17: spyil po gtsang ma phyi bdar legs par bgyis pa'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi 'byes pa khru gang ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-18: khru do ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260a-20: grva kun nas cha mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-0: sa dang sbyar ba'i @260b lci bas shin tu legs par phyi bdar bgyis la rtsva sngon po mnyen po lta bu la mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cha dbye ba'i thig gdab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po la padma rgya chen pos 'byes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-3: tshon sna brgyad kyi tshon rtsis bkra bar bgyi zhing 'byes par bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-5: rin po che ka ti ka las bgyi'o; ;padma'i mtha' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor la gra bzhi nas kha khyer sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-6: padma'i bar gyi zur zur du autpa la sngon po legs par bris la; kha khyer gyi phyi rol du nor bus 'khor ba'i mtha' de mtshos bskor bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-7: lha'i chab rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis la chab la me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-15: bya'i tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-18: chu srin byis pa gsod kun nas rten 'cha' bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-19: mtsho'i 'gram na rin po che'i ljon shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-20: me tog gi ljon shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-21: 'bras bu'i ljon shing sna tshogs kha khyer dang bcas par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:260b-22: dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer gyi phyi rol na lag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-0: thal mo'i phyag rgya bris la sgo bzhi @261a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-1: rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-2: de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du padma'i gdan bzang po bshams te de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-4: mthu chen thob gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-5: dkyil 'khor bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-8: byug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-9: ba dan bzang po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-10: gtor ma dkar po dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-11: yon chab dang zhabs bsil gyi snod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-12: mar me'i phreng ba dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-13: padma'i zhags pa 'od dpag med kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-14: rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-15: legs par khrus bgyis nas ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyis la zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas kha shar phyogs su bltas la skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas lag pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-16: byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis lhag par brtson par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-17: snying rje mchog tu brtse bar gyur pas sems can thams cad la brtse bar bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261a-18: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261b-0: ji tsam na thun tha ma la 'od dpag @261b med 'bar bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor chen po de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261b-1: rig sngags 'chang g-yo bar gyur nas lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261b-2: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis skya rengs shar tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag med gser spungs pa lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas phyag g-yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas mi gda' bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261b-3: shin tu rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i gnyid thob nas ji ltar nyal ba tsam mam mig btsum pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gzhal med khang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mtha' dag dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par mthong bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston par mdzad pa yang mthong bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261b-9: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:261b-12: cho 'phrul thams cad mthong bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-0: @262a *// 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-1: skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur te; skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-2: de sad nas zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas lag pa g-yas pas bzung na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-5: zhags pa grub pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-6: rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-7: 'khor khri brgyad stong dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-8: padma'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-9: de nas rig sngags 'chang rdo rje'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-12: kha che dar gyi skud pa mnyam du lhan cig bkal te khru nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshad tsam du bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-13: tsandan dkar po las rdo rje sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-14: rtse lnga pa 'byung po la sogs pa'i mgo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-15: sbrul gyi ska rags bcings la klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-16: nye dga' bo'i dra ba'i phreng bas dkri ba bgyis nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-17: de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262a-19: ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-0: rtsva'i stan bting nas ri mo'i gzugs @262b gyi mdun du lag pa g-yas pa zhags pas mnan nas don yod pa'i snying po khri bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-1: khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po stong bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-2: de nas zhags pa de 'bar bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-3: de bzung nas nam mkha' la 'gyur par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-7: padma'i rigs gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-8: lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-10: brtson 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-11: lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-12: lha'i lo khri nyis stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-13: las thams cad bgyid pa rdo rje'i zhags pa dgra thams cad 'joms par bgyid pa'i zhags pa steng ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-14: 'og gar 'phangs par yid la bsam pa bzhin thams cad bcings nas 'gugs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-15: phyogs bcur 'phangs te khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas skyes pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:262b-17: gzhan gang ci yang rung ba thams cad zhags pas bcings nas myur du 'gugs par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263a-1: zhags pas bcings nas myur du 'gugs par bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263a-3: zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo nam phyed na zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phangs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263a-4: 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263a-8: gdug pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis shing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis te bran bzhin du las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263a-9: bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263a-10: zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te lag pas zhags pa blangs te dur khrod du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263a-12: gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263a-13: phug gi sgor mchis nas rdo rje'i zhags pas brdabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263a-14: phug thams cad kyi sgo 'byed par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263a-15: 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa thams cad dum bur chag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263a-22: srog chags go na sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-0: gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags su @263b gtogs pa thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-2: lam drang por ji ltar rang gi gnas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-4: khang pa bzhin du zhugs nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrubs te slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-5: rdo rje zhags pa las thams cad bgyid pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-6: de nas rig sngags 'chang nor bu'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-7: rig sngags 'chang des nor bu btsal bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-12: aindra n'i la sor mo'i tshigs lhag tsam shin tu phyis la shin tu yongs su dag par bgyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-13: gser gyi me tog gi tshul du bgyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-16: tsam pa ka'i me tog ji lta ba de bzhin du bgyis la ras bzang po'i skud pa tshon rtsi mdzes pas kha bsgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-17: shin tu tshang la bab par bkal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-18: khru nyi shu rtsa gcig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-19: sor mo gung mo'i tshad tsam gyi nor bus brgyan la thor to gcig shos su ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-20: nor bu'am gser las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu gdags par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-21: de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:263b-22: legs par bkrus nas ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-0: de'i 'og tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du spos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang @264a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-1: ldan pa bgyis la grva bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhag cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-2: bog phor gyi snod bshams nas aa ga ru'i bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-4: du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chos kyi stan bzang po tshad dang ldan pa bshams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-6: ba dan sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-9: rol mo'i cha byad dag dgod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-10: rig sngags 'chang gis zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-15: spags pa rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-16: don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po nyi khri tshig stong bzlas nas lag pa g-yas pas chos kyi stan gyi steng du bzhag pa'i zhags pa la mnan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-17: lan nyi khri chig stong tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-18: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te yungs kar re nas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-19: lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264a-20: rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la yang @264b mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-1: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bco lnga'i nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis nas mchod pa cher bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-2: mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad la re re nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po las nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bgyis nas dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-3: de nas skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas nyin mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re nas gdeg par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-4: lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang sa cher g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs las kyang 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-6: nor bu'i zhags pa de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-7: rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-8: 'bar ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa g-yas las nor bu'i zhags pa blangs pa na sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-9: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:264b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'od @265a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265a-1: kyi rgyal po'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265a-2: zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265a-3: phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bor bzhag nas rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265a-6: khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265a-8: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265a-9: rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod rgur sgyur ba thams cad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265a-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod grub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i zhags pa thogs nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'bad mi dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i grub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265a-11: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa la ltos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265a-12: yid la ji ltar bsam pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265a-13: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs la ltos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265b-0: khyod shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du @265b song zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265b-1: 'on te bde ba can lta bur 'tshal lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265b-2: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyis mchod par 'tshal lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par 'tshal lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265b-16: gos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265b-17: rig sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug tu dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265b-18: bdug pa yang dbul bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265b-19: yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod zhags pa'i mchog 'di lag pa g-yon pas mnan la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265b-20: lag pa g-yas pas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i mchog bzung nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'di lta bu'i yid la bgyid pa chen po 'di lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu yang bsam nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:265b-21: yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod pa 'di bzlas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-0: snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu @266a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-1: brtse bar bgyis nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-2: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-4: dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-7: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-9: da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-10: yang dag par song ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-11: yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-12: blo gros chen po sh'a radva ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-13: gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan na 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa tshogs dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-14: bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag tu med la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-15: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo; ;tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-0: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal @266b lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-2: aom ma h'a padma tsandra ma ni ma ni//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-3: aa mo gha ma ni su ma ni/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-5: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa lam k'a ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-6: ma h'a aa mo gha ma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-7: tsa ra tsa ra sanytsa ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-8: ni sha tsa tsa ra shva ra ma h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-9: padma bhu dza ba ra da /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-10: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka ma h'a bi shva r'u pa dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-11: phra ba ra ma h'a bo dhi satva padma dha ra padma sa na padma ku ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-14: padma aa lam kri ta ta nu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-15: sa ha sra bhu dza sa ha sra ne tre n'a n'ad bhu ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-17: mu dra bi bhu shi t'a sa ha sra bhu dza /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-19: sha ta sa ha sra rashmi pra ti mandi ta sh'a r'a ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-22: a'a bha ra na dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-26: aindra n'i la padma r'a ga bhu shi t'a sh'a r'i ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-30: ma h'a bo dhi satva ba ra da pra hma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-31: bishtu ma he shva ra r'u pa dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-33: lo ke shva ra; ya mante shva ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-38: se n'a pa ti bo sh'a dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-42: ma h'a bhu ta ba sh'a dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-43: sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she kta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra bha ga wan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-44: p'u ra ya ma a'a t'a sh'anta ta ra ya p'u ra sh'a ya ya satva na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-47: m'a ra ya tri dva sha m'a lam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-48: sa ra sa ra p'a pam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-52: ma h'a tsi nat'a ma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-53: aa mo gha p'a sha dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-54: s'a dha ya s'a dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-56: ma ma tri bhu ba ni de by'a pra yatstsha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-57: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:266b-59: bo dha ya bo dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-1: bo dha ya sam bo dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-2: ma h'a pa shu pa ti p'a sha dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-3: aa na nta bi kurb'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-7: ga ga ne bi pu la bi m'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-9: na mo stu te bi bu la pu n+ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-11: ma h'a aa mo gha siddhi h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-12: aa bhi shi nytsa tu m'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-13: pi pu la k'i rti ka re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-16: aa mo gha bi pu le sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-17: ma h'a tsinta ma ni siddhe sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-18: ma h'a tsint'a ma ni siddhe ba ra de sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-19: sarba siddhe ba ra de sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-20: aom bi pu le shva ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-23: ma h'a aa mo gha siddhe h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-24: don yod nor bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-25: don yod pa'i zhags pa lag pas mnan na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-26: nam mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-27: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-28: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyang tshogs dang bcas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-31: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267a-32: gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-0: bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag tu mchod pa'i char gyi sprin @267b chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mthus mchod pa'i sprin chen por gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-2: bde ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med des rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-3: rig sngags 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur zhing mchod pa'i char chen po yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-4: gal te rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' las chu 'bebs par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-5: de'i tshe bsam pa tsam gyis 'bebs par 'gyur ro; ;'on te mi 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-6: nam mkha' de nyid na nam mkha' la grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-7: rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-8: dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-9: tshe pa skal pa chen po brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-12: 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-13: gus pa cher bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-14: 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:267b-15: lha rnams kyang babs nas rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268a-1: can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268a-3: lha thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268a-4: thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268a-5: gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268a-7: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268a-15: lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268a-16: phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268a-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268a-18: lha'i zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268a-19: lha'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-0: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams @268b cad la bstabs par 'tshal ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-3: nyin re zhing mchod pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-4: rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas ci 'byor bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-5: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-6: bdug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-7: pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa bzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-8: yid bzhin nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di yang mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-9: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gyi snying po lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-10: yid la bgyid pa yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-29: rin po che'i ljon shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-31: me tog gi ljon shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:268b-33: dpag bsam gyi ljon shing yid la bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269a-1: bzlas nas ji ltar yid la bsam zhing don du gnyer ba bzhin phyogs bcur 'phangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269a-2: de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis par ci bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269a-3: de bzhin du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma mchis pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269a-4: de bzhin du mthu chen po'i nor bu rgya chen don yod la mchod pa'i gzungs bzlas shing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di yang nyin gcig bzhin du thun gsum du lan gsum du bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269a-5: des na rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mnyes par bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269a-8: bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269a-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-0: dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyi rig @269b sngags 'chang la dran pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-4: gzi brjid stsol bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-5: nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-6: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-8: rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-9: mthong ba'i chos la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-11: sdang ba rnams rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-12: nad kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-20: lus la ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-22: pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pas ma lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-23: pha rol gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:269b-24: phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-0: sbyor ba mo'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur @270a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-1: ro; ;dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun chad gzung bar mi nus shing rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-2: de la bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-3: gang dag mnar med par gnas par 'gyur ba'i sems can nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-4: mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-7: bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongs su dkris pa gang lags pa de yang mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gdugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-9: gal te tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid cing smyung ba lan gcig bgyis te bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-10: de bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-11: gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las kyi sgrib pa snga ma rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-12: bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-13: 'khor ba'i nyes pas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-14: sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis padma bzhin du gos par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-15: mthong ba'i chos la sa lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270a-17: cho ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-0: phyir mi @270b ldog pa'i gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-1: dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-2: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes su mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-3: nyin gcig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-4: mthong ba'i chos la kun tu bzang po nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-8: phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-9: dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-10: yang dag par bskyed pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-11: rig sngags 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-12: chung ngu na rig sngags 'chang dur khrod du zhugs nas gum pa'i rus pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-15: chung ngu na gum pa'i gos bor ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-16: rtsig pa'i ri mo la rig sngags 'chang de'i grib mas phog par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-17: sems can gang gang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur pa de dang de nas mod la thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-18: de la yid gnyis sam som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:270b-19: gang dag ches mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271a-2: dge bsnyen ma dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chad bar bgyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271a-11: de nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271a-12: mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya stong mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271a-14: mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271a-16: gzungs 'di nyid re zhig kun chub par bgyis nas mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271a-17: dgos pa mang pos grim par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271a-18: de nas rig sngags 'chang don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrubs nas yid la bsam ste bsam pa'i las thams cad bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271a-21: bgyi ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-0: ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon sum du mthong nas lung bstan pa bzhin du don yod pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa 'di @271b de bzhin du blta bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-2: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa mgrin par btags la lag pa g-yas pas nor bu blangs te lag pa g-yon pas lcags kyu blangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-3: mi gda' bar gyur nas gar dga' ba der 'jug par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-4: mtshan mo yang nor bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyin par ji lta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-5: thams cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-16: thang gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-17: thams cad du mi mngon par zhugs nas slar ldog par 'gyur zhing ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-18: mi rnams kyi nang du lha'i tshe lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-20: nye ba'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-21: 'on te rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-22: zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-23: gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-24: gtsang ma'i gnas sam phyogs su ba'i lci ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-25: ba'i rnam lngas yongs su sbyar bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:271b-26: gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272a-0: me tog sil ma bkram zhing bum pa gang @272a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272a-1: bas brgyan cing spos sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i bdug pa gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272a-2: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du stan bzang po bshams te shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas zhags pa sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du zlum po bskyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272a-3: dbus su nor bu gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272a-4: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272a-5: don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272a-6: de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de'i 'og tu tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272a-8: du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul zhing nor bu la brtag par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272a-10: de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa gda' ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272a-12: byang chub sems dpa' gda' ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272b-13: nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272b-22: ngo mtshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang na gda' bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272b-23: dge ba'am mi dge ba de dag thams cad kyang gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272b-36: gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272b-37: skrag pa chen po de dag thams cad me long gi dkyil 'khor la ji ltar ba de bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272b-38: gang bsam zhing gang gnyer ba 'grub pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272b-41: mi dge ba thams cad gda' bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272b-45: dngos po don yod gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272b-46: char mi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:272b-47: ji tsam 'tshal bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-1: mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-2: nyi ma 'char kar nyi ma la bstan na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-3: nyi ma babs nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-4: zla ba tshes pa la bstan na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-5: zla ba babs nas 'dod rgu thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-6: chu klung chen por bstan na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-7: rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-9: sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-12: ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-15: gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;ma mo'i gnas sam nag po chen po la bstan te spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-16: nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-17: las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-18: rgyal po'i mngon sum du bstan na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-19: yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273a-20: blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273b-6: ngo mtshar du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273b-7: skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhags pa 'phangs te don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:273b-8: ji ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsam pa bzhin me tog dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:278b-13: dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:278b-15: nyin gcig bzhin lhab lhub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:278b-17: rgyan rnams stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:278b-18: nyin gcig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag rtsed mo'i don du dgug par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:278b-19: rnam thos kyi mgul du btags te khros pas drangs nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:278b-20: de nas rnam thos mchis nas nyin gcig bzhin dong tse stong stong stsol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:278b-22: des nyin gcig bzhin sbyin pa yang stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:278b-24: nag po chen po'i mgul du btags la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te khros pas lag pa g-yas pa'i thal lcag gis gdeg par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-0: nag po chen pos sgra phyung ba na rig sngags 'chang skrag par mi @279a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-1: bgyid par slar yang khros pas gdag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-2: de nas mchi ma zags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-3: rig sngags 'chang gis mchi ma zed de thig le bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-4: mi gda' bar gyur nas gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-5: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang thal mos gdeg bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-6: de nas nag po chen po khrag tu skyug pa rig sngags 'chang gis byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-7: nam mkha' la mchis nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-8: gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-9: nag po chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-10: ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-11: gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba bgyid pas dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-12: mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-13: de nas zhags pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri mo'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa brjod par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-14: 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-15: rnam pa'i kha dog gzugs bstan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-16: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-17: cho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-18: lag pa stong dang mig stong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-19: mtha' yas pa yi phyag rgya bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-20: rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279a-21: khams gsum dag tu bstan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-0: gdul @279b bya gdul phyir gzugs bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-1: gsang ba 'di yis gzugs bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-2: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-3: rig sngags grub pa bla med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-4: de nyid zhags pa sgrub phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-5: de bas rig 'dzin shes rab can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-6: 'jig rten pha rol rjes mthun pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-7: sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-8: de bzhin gshegs kun lta ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-9: bde can lta bar 'tshal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-12: mchog tu gus par bgyi ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-13: cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-14: de nyid gus par dad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-15: shin tu dang ba nyid du bgyi; ;grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-16: sna tshogs pa yi gzugs bsten te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-17: sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-18: don yod rgyal po cho ga'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-20: don yod 'bras bu dam pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-21: don yod kun tu grub pa 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-22: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-24: 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-27: don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-29: de lta bas na kun bsgrims te; ;bdag nyid yongs su dag bgyis nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-30: ji ltar cho ga bkod pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-31: rjes su mthun par ri mo'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:279b-32: rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs blta zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-0: zhags pa'i gzugs ni sna tshogs @280a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-2: de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-3: rig sngags rgyal po de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-4: dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-5: sbyin sreg rlung lha chu lha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-6: khro bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-7: lha dang klu yang ston pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-8: gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-9: 'byung po lha min dri za dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-10: nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-11: lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-12: 'jig rten mgon pos mchog sbyin bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-13: gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-14: tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-15: gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-16: dbang phyug chen po nyi ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-17: zla gzugs rgyu skar ches grangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-18: 'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-19: gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-20: sems can rnams la phan 'tshal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-21: gdul ba'i don du 'gro ba'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-22: sems can rnams la bstan pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-23: de bas som nyi nyid mi bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-24: mchog tu dad par bgyi ba lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-25: ji ltar mthun pa'i dgos pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-26: ji ltar mthun pa bzhin du sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-27: ji ltar mthun pa'i ri mo'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-28: ji ltar mthun pa'i zhags pa sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-29: gnas ni gang du 'os pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-30: gang du sems ni dga' 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-31: gom pa gang gis phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-33: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-34: kun tu sgrol ba 'dren pa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280a-35: don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-0: don yod pa yi @280b grub pa 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-1: don yod dgos pa thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-2: grub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-3: mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-4: zhags pa dang ri mo sgrub pa'i cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-5: de nas don yod pa'i las dang dgos pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gi chog bshad par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-6: sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-7: sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-9: bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-10: gdug pa thams cad zlog pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-11: sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-12: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu drug las grol bar bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-13: 'jigs pa ma bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-14: mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu 'joms pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-15: pha rol gyi dpung zlog pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-21: mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig par bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-22: yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'joms pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-23: lha'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-24: de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-25: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad sgrub par bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-26: sems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog sbyin shin tu rnyed par dka' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-27: lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:280b-28: klu thams cad dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyin mtshan du gzigs par som nyi ma @281a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-3: dus kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma mchis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-4: rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-5: blon po dang bcas pa bsrung ba'i don du thams cad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur lags so; ;de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas gtsang ma'i gnas su mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-6: gtsang ma yi ni sa phyogs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-7: ca co ma mchis dben par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-8: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-9: drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-10: zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-11: don du sdig pa thams cad 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-13: thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-14: dgra dang log 'dren gdug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-15: gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-16: gdug sems can rnams dred ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-17: skrag par bsdigs pa drag shul spyod; ;gsang sngags sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-18: gsang sngags sgrub pa bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-20: sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-21: me lha'i lha dang klu dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-22: de bzhin rig pa 'dzin pa 'ang dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-23: khung brkos de la padma'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-24: padma rtag tu bri bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-25: cho ga ji bzhin khung nang gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281a-26: padma la ni ge sar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-0: gru bzhi 'am ni zlum po @281b ste; ;de lta bur ni brko bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-1: legs par byugs shing shin tu nag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-2: shin tu sbas shing tshad la dbab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-3: tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-4: shin tu bkra shis dag la bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-5: bkra shis phyag rgya chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-6: bzang pos gtor ma'i las bgyi 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-7: gdug pa me tog la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-8: bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-9: thog mar me lha bkug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-10: de nas sbyin sreg las rnams bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-11: rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-12: legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-13: gsang sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-14: de la mtshams kyang bcing bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-15: bdag srung gtsug tor bcing ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-16: gzhan srung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-17: de bzhin grogs bgyid srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-18: rgyun du aa ka'i shing sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-19: dri yi shing rnams nyid dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-20: mar dang yungs kar 'bras yos dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-21: nyi shu gcig dbul me ston bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-22: de nas me yi lha dgug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-23: aom na mo aagni dzv'a la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-25: dzyod snra pra bha manda la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-26: sarbba bde a'a hu ti rakti ni rata tushna dzv'a la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-28: aa tsi sh'a mu kha trishna /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-29: ra shmid pa aagni shtsa bi tu tashttsa h'u ta sha na mu khan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-31: sarbba yaksha ma h'a birya ma h'a dza ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-34: sarbba da ha na pra pu la a'a ka sha sa mu gad ka shtsa aa pa pra sad k'a shan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:281b-36: ma ni ta sarbba tra di pa bya r'u pa bi sh'a ra da a'a b'a h'a na sarbba ta tra g'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-1: hu tra shanta ma si bi dha ma kan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-3: mukta ra shmi ma pri yam ku gandha pha l'a ha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-6: s'ukshma su t'i kshna shtsa mri ti sa na dzi bi na /
