K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-7: pri yo ba shma pushpa bhasma pa stra tsa bha smra ba stra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-9: bhasma sanytsa dha ni tyandhu ma m'a ku la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-11: ba ka siddha ra sa dha ra sa gr'a tsa ra sarba tra pra dha ba ri sh'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-12: sarba tri ni ra ma ri sha no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-13: ni tya sprishta dhashta na mun tsa si /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-14: dv'a trid sha bha ban de pa aagni mu kha de b'a ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-15: ae ru tsi ru dz'a ba la ba da ka ma h'a na ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-19: aa y'antu s'a dha shi ghram ka ra ma s'a dha ya tad tva ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-22: hu ru hu ru h'um phat sv'h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-23: gsang sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-24: bzlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-25: gu gul yungs kar mar sbyar la; ;spar bdun spar bas me la dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-26: mchod yon snod rnams dbul pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-27: de bzhin sbar ba'i sbar bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-28: dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-29: bdug pa rgya chen dbul bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-30: de bzhin 'bras bu sbar bar dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-31: de nas chab kyis gsang ba bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-32: ji ltar lha rnams rim bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-33: nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-34: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-35: sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-36: dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-37: blag sha au dum ba ra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-38: sna ma'i me tog tsam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282a-39: kar ni ka ra nyid dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-1: de bzhin dri bda'i tsandan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-2: byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-3: de bzhin gzhan yang dri bda'i shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-5: sha mi shi ba'i las lagss pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-6: mchod yon de bzhin rtsa dag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-7: de dag gis ni me spar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-8: sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-10: aa ga ru dang du ru ska //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-11: kun tu ru la sogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-12: du ru skar bcas spri ka dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-13: spang spos pri yang ku blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-14: de dag lhan cig sbyar bsres shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-15: mar ram mar gsar lan cig brdzi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-16: don yod rgyal po'i gsang sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-17: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-19: lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-20: nam phyed na me lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shin tu gnas pa langs nas phyogs bcur lta zhing kun tu brtags nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-23: bdag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-24: khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-25: mchog slongs shig dang thams cad sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-26: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams bslang bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:282b-27: ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-1: gis mchod yon gyi snod dag 'bul zhing gtor ma dbul ba'i las bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-2: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsres pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing 'bras bu'i shing sbar nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-3: stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-4: thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyud nas dngul gyi gzhong pa kha zas kyis bkang ste pus mo nub tsam du dbul bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-5: rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-6: blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang gi lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-7: de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-8: nam mkha'i rig sngags kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-9: bskal pa bcu tshun chad kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-10: don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha ton du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-11: gal te snod mi len na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-13: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283a-14: rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-0: khyod kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga de @283b bsgrubs zin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-1: mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-2: zhes de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-3: ci bsam pa'i mchog smras pa de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa de las snod blangs te rang gi lag nas rig sngags 'chang la stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-5: rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas zas kyi gong bu de bza' bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-6: 'tshal pa tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-7: lus las me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-8: don yod rgyal po'i rig sngags 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-9: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-11: gangg'a'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-12: gangg'a'i klung bye ba khri phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang don yod pa'i rab tu gnas pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-13: rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-15: nags tshal dang bcas pa me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-16: 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:283b-20: myu gur bcas pa kha cig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284a-5: rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284a-6: gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284a-7: ta ma la dang tsam ba ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284a-14: kub pya ka'i me tog dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284a-17: skyed mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284a-19: yid du mchis par 'gyur ro; ;lha'i chu klung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284a-22: rdzing lha'i tsandan gyi dri chab kyis yongs su gang ba de la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284a-26: padma dkar pos legs par brgyan pa'i char gser gyi bye ma legs par bdal ba'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284a-29: dri za'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284a-35: mi 'am ci'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing lha'i 'byor pa gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas na thams cad du rtse bar bgyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284b-0: byang chub kyi snying po la @284b thug pa nas byang chub la mchis kyi bar du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284b-1: chos kyi 'khor los bskor ba nas yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i bar du tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284b-2: de bzhin du grub pa bla na med pa chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284b-3: de ltar zas kyi gong bu sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284b-4: phogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs nas mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las mngon sum du chos nyan pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284b-6: de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ro; ;don yod pa'i zhags pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284b-7: rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284b-8: chog zhib mo'i rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid du gnas par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:284b-9: klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas rtag par rgyun du mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-3: lto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-4: 'og min gyi gnas kyi lha rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyun du yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-5: lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan ba'i bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-7: gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-10: rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-11: de la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga don yod pa sgrub pa dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-12: 'on te skal pa chung ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis la des snod de blangs pa tsam gyi mod la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-13: lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-14: reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lha'i lo brgya khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-15: de la phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-17: sgrib pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285a-21: rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-2: yi dvags kyi yul thams cad las yongs su grol par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-3: sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-8: sems can thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-9: thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-10: tshig btsan zhing don yod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-11: 'gum pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa bzhed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-13: dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-14: dus bgyis nas skal pa mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-15: padma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-16: lan 'ga' yang phyir ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-17: phyis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-19: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag tu mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-20: dpral bar thig le bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-21: thams cad du mi gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:285b-22: me lha rtag par rgyun du dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-2: de nas don yod bsgongs pa sgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-3: rig sngags 'chang des 'bras dang sran ma ma shar bsres te bsgril la bsgongs nas mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-6: sbrang rtsi lhan cig brdzis nas bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-7: des 'og tu shing k'a ra b'i ra'i me sbar nas bsgongs pa re re la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i nang na sbyin sreg bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-8: nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-9: de nas rig sngags 'chang yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-10: me tog ci snyed pa dang bsres te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i dbus su stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-13: khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-14: de nas me'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bsgongs pas bkang nas rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-15: khyod kyis zas bsgongs pa sgrub pa'i cho ga grub zin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-16: lha'i zas bsgongs pa chen po longs shig ces stob par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-17: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zas bsgongs pa'i snod de blang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286a-18: blangs pa tsam kho nas bcud kyis len du gyur nas nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-0: skra cung zad @286b 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-1: pags pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-2: rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-3: rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba drug khri brgya stong gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-4: me lha gnas dang gzhal med khang dang bcas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-5: 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du mchis nas las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-6: gang dang gang gis zas bsgongs pa la reg pa de yang thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-7: don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-8: rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-9: gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas pa 'di nyin gcig bzhin shloo ka stong klog gam 'chang bar bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-10: tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-11: padma las brdzus te skyes nas skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-12: lan 'ga' yang phyis dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-14: sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-15: mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-16: dpral ba la thig le bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-17: mi gda' bar gyur nas 'byung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:286b-19: srin po thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-0: bud med gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgongs @287a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-5: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rnyed nas yun ring du 'tsho zhing yid gzhungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-7: bstan bcos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-8: de nas skye bo 'bum zas stsal bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-9: 'o ma'i thug pa bsgrub par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-10: gnas gtsang ma gcom bskyungs par shing k'a ra b'i ra'i lcug mas dkrug cing don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-11: de nas khro bo'i rgyal po chab dang yungs kar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-12: de nas zas bsgongs pa gcig snod kyi nang nas phyung nas 'o thug nang du stsal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-13: de nas char bgos te thog mar dkon mchog gsum la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-14: de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-15: de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287a-28: slong mo ba rnams la rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287b-0: ji tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal @287b par kha zas 'tshal du stsal kyang snod de gang ba'am bri bar mi mngon zhing de bas par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287b-1: gang dag zas de 'tshal ba de dag sngon gyi sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287b-3: bar du gcod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287b-4: nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287b-7: mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287b-10: srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287b-12: nga ro lha ltar mnyen zhing snyan la dga' bar bgyid pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287b-13: rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287b-14: rtag tu ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba yang dag par stob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287b-15: tshe brdzes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:287b-16: 'o ma'i thug pas lhung bzed bkang nas de gnas mthon po bla gab med par dkyil 'khor bgyis te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhung bzed de dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-0: phul ba tsam gyi mod la chu bo gangg'a'i bye ma 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i zas bsgongs pa dang @288a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-1: lha'i 'o thug gis lhung bzed bkang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-2: lha'i tsandan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me tog sil ma bkram pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-3: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-7: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon sbyong bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-8: gang gi phyir yon sbyang nas skal pa dang mthun pa'i tshe 'di nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-9: gzhan du dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-10: grub pa chen po'i gser gyis 'byor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-11: mdzod dang bang mdzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-14: lha thams cad kyis de la srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288a-17: de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-0: rig sngags 'chang des legs par khrus bgyis @288b te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas 'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-1: sgron shing dang aarka'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-2: spyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-3: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-5: klu'i rgyal po thams cad gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-15: mi ma lags pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-16: mi thams cad 'khor dang bcas par dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-18: rig 'dzin thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-19: nub thams cad du bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-20: brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris gyi lha rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-21: lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-22: gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo rnams babs nas dbang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-23: ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid cing ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:288b-24: zla ba nya nas brtsams te mar gyi ngo'i tshes nyi shu gsum mam gnam stong gi bar du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289a-1: gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar nas gnam stong gis rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289a-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289a-3: legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289a-10: gang gnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289a-17: cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa de dag thams cad sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289a-29: 'bru 'thob pa de dag thams cad sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289a-36: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-0: @289b ri la rgyu ba de dag thams cad sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-1: de nas rig sngags 'chang gi ji ltar yid la bsam zhing smras pa de dag thams cad stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-2: rig sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam gyi mod la dri med don yod lta ba zhes bgyi ba lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-3: tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-4: padma'i ze ba'i dbus nas brdzus te skyes nas skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-5: don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-6: rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-7: dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-8: chog zhi ba mo mtha' dang bcas pa 'di rdzogs te byang chub kyi snying p la thug gi bar du kha don du gnas par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-9: de nas la du'i spyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-10: rig sngags 'chang des kha zas la la du stong rtsa brgyad bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-11: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-12: de nas legs par khrus bgyis te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-13: de nas la du mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-14: shin tu dri zhim po'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:289b-15: stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang me'i dbus nas khye'u zhig byung nas snod lha'i la dus bkang nas dbul bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-1: nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te khye'u de'i lag tu gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-2: khye'u des rig sngags 'chang la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-5: rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod pa thams cad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-7: rig sngags 'chang snod kyi la du khyer cig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-8: 'dis khyod kyi dgos pa dpag tu med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-10: khyod kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-14: khyod kyi grub pa'i mchog yin no; ;de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snod gang ba da blangs te khye'u la yang khyed kyis kho bo'i grogs shig gyis ces brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-16: dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa'i grogs bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-18: gang gi tshe dgos pa byang ba de'i tshe gu gul dang tsandan lhan cig bsres la mar dang yungs kar sbyar nas don yod lcags kyu lan bdun bzlas te sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-19: aarka'i shing gi me sbar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-20: sbyin sreg bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la bdag bkug pas mod la mchis nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290a-22: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyis mchis shing bkur stir spyad par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-1: srin po thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-2: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis la du de la reg par bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-3: nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang gi rigs thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-4: rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-5: rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba sa ya phrag gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-6: bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-7: tshe'i tshang lha'i bskal ba drug khrir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-8: skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-9: la du lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas don yod rgyal po'i khro bos dbang bskur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-11: bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-16: bu mo thams cad la stsal bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-17: longs spyod du stsal kyang bas par mi 'gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-19: ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-20: ji srid du skye bo 'bum 'bum mang zhing phal che bar stsal kyang gtugs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-21: la du la don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-22: de'i 'og tu gang du reg pa de yang gser bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:290b-23: la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te klu'i gnas su 'phangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-1: mtsho chen po mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-2: bsgo na char mi 'bab pa bsgo ba bzhin char 'bebs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-3: ci bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-5: bsgo ba bzhin ha cang char chen po 'gums par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-9: ser ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis gcod par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-10: phug gi sgor la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas phug gi sgor bsnun na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-11: phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-14: sgo glegs thams cad dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-15: gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-16: nags tshang tshing gi dbus su 'phangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-17: nags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad phye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-18: la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'phangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291a-21: srin po dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-0: 'byung po thams cad sgren mor gyur nas thams @291b cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-1: rma ma byung ba'i mi ro la dri chab kyis khrus bgyis la la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te lag pa gnyis su la du stsal la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-2: gos dkar pos ro g-yogs nas khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar dang chab la lan bdun bzlas nas dbang bskur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-3: ci dris pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-14: yams kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba smra bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-17: dmyal bar skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-19: tshe thung ba smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-20: dus ma lags pa'i 'chi ba smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-21: gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-24: mig 'phrul gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-25: cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-27: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-29: ril bu 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-30: nam mkha' la mchi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:291b-31: mi gda' bar bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-1: gcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-4: 'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas bskal ba las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-6: da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-7: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chab kyi khar stsal la la du blangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-9: la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal po'i sgor bsnun na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-10: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-11: nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-12: grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-13: grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-16: bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur zhing nor chen po 'du ba 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-17: mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-18: la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te dpal lha mo chen me'i lag par stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-19: dpal lha mo chen mo dbang du gyur nas nor chen po stsol cing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-20: la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas khug ma'i nang du stsal te mchan khung du bsrel bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292a-21: ji tsam du bsal ba de srid du mi gda' bar gyur nas gang du stsal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-1: 'bab chu gcig par la du la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdeg na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-2: 'dod rgyur bsgyur ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-3: ji ltar bsam pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-4: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-5: la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-6: ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po'i spyi gtsug tu bzhag la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-7: de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-8: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas mngag gzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-9: la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nag po chen po'i lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-10: ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-11: las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:292b-12: la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-0: ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan @293a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-2: nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-5: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi rig sngags 'chang de'i yon sbyong ba mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-6: la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur la lcags kyu'i rgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-7: me thab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-8: de nas aarka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar la la du de med thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-11: sbrang rtsi bsres pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-12: lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-13: me lha me'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis byung nas rig sngags 'chang la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-19: bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-20: rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la bsam zhing 'dod pa smros shig dang mchog sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293a-21: rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-0: me lha des kyang @293b thams cad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-1: las thams cad grub par stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-2: me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-3: 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams gangs bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur te chab nas byung ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-4: lag pas me rnams tshugs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-5: 'bar ba bzhin du klad pa'i spyi bor bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-6: skra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-7: me'i dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-8: 'bar bzhin du g-yar gyi nang du bsrel na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-9: cung zad dro ba tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-11: ji ltar tsandan bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-12: gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-13: gos kyi mtha' mar thum po bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-15: chab kyi nang du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-17: sbyin sreg thams cad kyi cho ga so so'i gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-18: thams cad du dgos pa grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-19: dgos pa gang dang gang du bskos pa de dang der dgos pa thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-20: thams cad du gsang sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-22: cho ga sgrub pa thams cad lung 'bogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-25: me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag tshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:293b-26: dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-2: thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-3: de nas don yod me 'bar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-5: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-6: gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-7: phyogs bcu'i kho ra khor yug gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-8: kun nas su ni gsal bar bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-9: sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-11: bcud kyi mchog ste dam pa lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-12: nor sgyur smra ba bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-13: gzhan yang 'tshed pa sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-14: sgrub pa bla na med pa lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-15: ji ltar nyin mtshan gda' bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-16: nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-17: lan gcig dgos pa sgrub pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-18: legs par las bgyis nor bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-19: rdzas bsres legs par bgyis pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-20: gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-21: gtsang mas spyad pas sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-22: don yod chu dang me dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-23: me yi shing rnams brjod par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-25: de dag thams cad gcig spungs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-26: yam sreg cho ga bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-27: tsandan dang ni seng ldeng dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-28: pa tang k'a ra b'i ra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-29: aarka sha mi smyug ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-30: shir sha k'a n'a ka ri ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-31: 'o ma'i shing dang byang chub shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-32: blag sha dang ni sna ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-34: rtsa ba dang ni lo mar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-35: padma dkar po ku mu da //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-36: autpal me tog lo ma rtsa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294a-37: bi dza p'u ra bil ba shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-0: sin du ba ra tsam @294b pa ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-1: dre ka bi tsu marde tsa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-2: sa ha ba la tsi dra ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-3: shing de kun ka bsdus pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-4: yam sreg shing gis las bgyis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-5: yungs kar mar dang zho dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-6: sbrang rtsi 'bras yos sbyin sreg bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-7: bzang po'i zangs las srang gsum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-8: mtshal las gnyis 'gyur gang bskus kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-9: srang gcig tsandan dkar po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-10: srang bcu ldong ros srang gcig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-11: de dag bsres pa'i rdzas rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-12: de bzhin yung ni nyis 'gyur dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-13: zhig ga dag ni bkang nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-14: me thab dbus su gzhug par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-15: sbyin sreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-16: shin tu mnyam bzhag legs gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-17: gtsang ma gtsang mar spyod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-18: gos gtsang legs par khrus bgyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-19: dri zhim dri yis bsgo bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-20: ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-21: me tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-22: bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-23: stong rtsa brgyad ni tshangs ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-24: de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-25: me tog bdug pa mchod yon snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-26: dbul ta 'o mas ma dag ma dgum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-28: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas yungs kar gyis snun par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-29: khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-31: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhi ga de la mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:294b-32: de nas zangs kyi sgrom bu'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-1: sgrom bur zhi ga nas nor bu blangs te sgrom bu der gzhag par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-2: yid bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba bzhin du 'di yang don yod pa 'bar ba mthu chen po'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-4: zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-6: nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-7: nam 'tshed pa'i dus kyi tshe nor bu de bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-8: 'tsho ba dang sred pa dang 'tshed pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-9: nam hom bgyid pa de'i tshe thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-11: thams cad kyi thams cad du dgos pa rnams sgron mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-12: g-yul ngo chen por g-yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-15: go char bsdams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po de'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas gcig pu g-yul gyi dbus su zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-16: de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-17: de nas g-yul 'gyed pa'i pha rol gyi dpung rnams bam par gyur nas phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byer bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295a-18: phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pa rol gyi dpung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-0: pha rol gyi dgra dang @295b mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-1: lag pas nor bu bzung nas phug gi gnas su zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-2: gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-3: gnas na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-4: klu'i gnas thams cad du mchis nas lag pas nor bu bzung ste gnas kyi nang du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-5: chab thams cad kyis phyir mi tshugs bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-6: de nas klu thams cad mdun du mchis nas bden par dam bca' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-7: dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-8: bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-12: nags tshal thams cad bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-13: snyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-14: gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-15: dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-16: mi bde ba chung bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-17: sems can gang dag gis kyang lo tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-19: 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-20: gzhan ches mang po dag gis dgos pa mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-21: nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba chen po lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:295b-22: de nas don yod snang ba rnam par lta bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste rang gi gzugs su sblta bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-1: sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-2: lus legs par bkrus te spos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-3: shing aarka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-9: mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-10: de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-11: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad bsam pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-12: ji ltar yid la bgyid cing bsam pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-13: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bgyis shing bsam pa'i mchog smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-14: de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-15: de nas mig sman sgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-16: rig sngags 'chang legs par bkrus te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-17: nub gcig smyung ba bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-18: des zangs kyi za ma gtog bgyis la de nas mig sman so bi ra dang yung ba nyis 'gyur du bsres pas dgang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296a-19: de nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid nas thab kyi dbus su gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-0: @296b de'i steng du au shi ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-5: mar bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-6: shing aarka'i me spar bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-7: lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-8: de nas mig sman blangs la gtun gyi steng du legs par zhib tu btags la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-11: gla rtsi bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-12: thams cad du mgul la legs par sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-13: de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-14: don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag rgya bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-15: de nas mig sman gyis byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-16: nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-17: skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-19: dpral bar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-20: mig la bskus te tshig gzhan mi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-21: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-22: mchod pa phal po ches cher mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-23: nor 'du ba grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:296b-24: sgrub pa'i dus sam bzlas brjod kyi dus su mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-2: bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-3: phyis kyang bgegs byed par mi nus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-4: bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-5: bde ba sgrub pa'i mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-6: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-7: mig la byugs te skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-8: de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-12: lhab lhub rgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-13: bud med kyang mig mi 'dzum par blta bzhin du bdag nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-15: mig la byugs te dgon pa chen por zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-22: sprul gyi dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-23: bde legs su slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-26: 'gyed pa thams cad la mig sman /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-28: smra ba rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-29: thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-30: g-yul der g-yul 'gyed pa'i nang du mchis nas mig la byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-31: thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-32: 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-33: gdug pas zin pa thams cad la mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297a-34: gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-3: rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-4: rims nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-5: dug mi zad pa 'tshal ba la mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-7: gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-8: gdon brgyad khri bzhi stod las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-9: mig bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-10: klad pa cher bro 'tshal ba la yang mig la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-11: tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-12: brjed byed kyi zin pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-13: rgyal po khros pas gsad par 'os pa gang su yang rung ba khrid pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa'i thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-14: nag po chen po'i mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-15: rang gi gzugs kyis dus su mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol cing dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-16: ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-17: dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te mig mi 'dzum par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-18: dpal lha mo chen mo mchis nas dgos pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-19: 'bru rab tu mang po stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:297b-20: nyal ba'i tshe mig la bskus te nyal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-1: po mang zhing phal che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-3: mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-4: dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-5: mig la bskus te tshogs kyi dbus su zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-6: mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-8: rtag tu mchog stsol par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-10: gi'u wang dang lhan cig sbyar te mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-11: dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-12: longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-13: don chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-16: 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas thams cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-17: dpal lha mo chen mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-18: 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing las bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-19: nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi dpral ba dang mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-20: gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298a-21: mi ro'i mig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-2: byad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-5: gsang sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-6: lan 'ga' yang slar zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-7: bkres pa'i mig la bskus te grong du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-9: btung ba'i ston mo lhun gyis 'grub cing 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-10: bsod snyoms pa'i mig la bskus te bsod snyoms la mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-11: kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-12: yon phal po che 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-20: mig gi rdzi ma rdung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-21: mig sle bo de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-22: mig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-23: lha'i mig dag pa 'dab bzang dang mtshungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-24: 'dab bzang gi mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-25: dbang du gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-26: don grub pa yang thob nas dbang phyug bla na med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-32: rgyan 'phyang thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-34: don yod me lha dgug pa'i sbyin sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-35: grub pa kun gyi bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-36: don kun grub pas mod la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:298b-37: mkhas rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-3: the tshom du yang mi bgyi zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-4: yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-5: gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-6: legs par bkrus pas las sgrub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-7: sbyin sreg bla na med 'phel ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-8: 'di ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-9: ka ran rtsa ba sdong bur bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-10: 'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas; ;aarka'i shing dang blag sha'i shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-11: yam sreg ngag gis me sbar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-12: sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-13: 'bras yos til dang yungs kar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-14: zho dang sbrang rtsi mar dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-15: yungs mar dag dang bskyes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-16: sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad tshang bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-17: khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-18: de nas don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gu gul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-20: mar du sbyar bas sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-21: dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299a-39: byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-0: dbang phyug gi 'byor @299b pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-1: de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas mig la bskus te don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-2: de nas mig la mig sman gyis bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-3: nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-4: mig sman grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-5: sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-7: mig sman 'dis mig la byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-8: nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing mi gda' bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-11: srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-12: thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-13: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-15: mig sman 'dis mig la byugs nas ma mo'i gnas su zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-16: lha gtso bo de dag mig 'dzum par lta bar bgyid pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:299b-17: de nas ma mo dang lha'i gtso bo thams cad mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-0: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las thams cad sgrub par bgyid pas @300a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-2: ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bkur cing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-3: rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-5: sba ba'i phyir gnas shing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-6: de nas gi'u wang sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi chog brjod par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-7: don yod rgyal po grub pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-8: rig sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-9: lha dang lha min mchod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-10: sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-11: dbang du gyur pa dam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-12: mkha' la mchi ba'i dam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-13: mi snang shin tu rnyed dka' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-14: mod la phug tu 'jug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-15: nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-16: ri sul dag tu 'jug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-17: thang dag la ni rgyu ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-18: klu gnas mtshor ni 'jug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-19: de bzhin chu klung che bsgral dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-20: rdzu 'phrul grub dang skyes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-21: de bzhin 'jigs dang sgrib kun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-22: nad kun zhi bar bgyid pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-23: sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-24: g-yul dor g-yul las rgyal bgyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-25: rtag tu dgra kun brlag par bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-26: gdon rigs kun kyang tshar gcod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-27: rims rnams thams cad zlog par bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-28: sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-29: sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300a-30: dbang phyug stsol cing skal pa stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-1: 'gyed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-2: bcing pa dang ni shing sgrog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-3: khong sgril lcags sgrog phye mar rlog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-4: rgyal po gdug pa khros pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-5: gsad par 'os pa sel bar bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-6: da lta 'di la brten pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-7: mi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-8: mi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-9: 'di ni kun tu sdug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-10: gnas kun mchis par mchod par 'os //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-11: lus can snying du rtag tu sdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-12: rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-13: rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-14: dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-15: rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-16: bud med kun dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-17: skyes pa khye'u bu mo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-18: rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-19: gi'u wang bla na med pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-20: 'di la gang dag rtag brten na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-21: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ste; ;mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod pa bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-22: tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-23: nyin dang mtshan du srung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-24: rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-25: gzhan yang lha ni mang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-26: klu yi rgyal po mthu chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-27: 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-28: grul bum mi min lto 'phye che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-29: dri za lha min nyid dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-30: nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-31: de dag thams cad srung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-32: ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-33: rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-34: gi wang grub pa dam pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:300b-35: de ltar stobs dang ldan pa lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-1: ba yis; ;gtsang gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-2: gtsang ma yi ni gos bgo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-3: gi wang legs par bsgrubs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-4: dmar po chen po nyid dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-5: gur gum dag dang mnyam sbyar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-6: zangs kyi snod du bkang nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-7: don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-8: stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-9: rgya dar gyis ni kha dgum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-10: de nas seng ldeng gi shing dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-11: aarka'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-17: zho dang sbrang rtsi mar du bsres te lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-18: lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-19: de nas me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo yang zhi ba dang thal ba blangs te snod kyi nang du stsal nas de nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-20: khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-21: de nas dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis nas nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-22: rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur zhing skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-23: lo dgu khri dgu stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301a-24: dpral ba la thig le bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-0: mi gda' bar gyur nas gnas thams cad du zhugs na gnas thams cad kyi bdag @301b por 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-3: srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-6: srin po mthu dang ldan pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-7: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-9: ji ltar nyin bar bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro; ;sa'i phug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-10: thang gi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-11: thang gi gnas su zhugs nas thang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-13: chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-14: khyim dang gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-15: rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-16: chab la gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad du dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-17: klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-18: lus mtha' dag byugs te g-yul ngor g-yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-19: ya lad dang go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-20: khar bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-21: btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang phyug du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:301b-22: gang la tshig smras pa de dag thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-0: gang la blangs pa de dag thams @302a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-2: gang la bsgo ba de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-3: khar 'chos nas gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-6: bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-7: nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-8: lag pa g-yas pa la byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-9: su reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-17: mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur nas bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-18: mdzub mo g-yas pa la bskus nas ser ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-20: 'brug gi dus su sprin la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-23: ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-24: dpag tshad gcig khor khor yug tu zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-26: lag pa g-yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan pas ha chang char che ba gcod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-27: char mi 'bab pa'i dus su lag pa g-yas pa'i lag mthil la byugs nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i chu la thal mo lan gsum pa brdabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-28: de'i mod la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po gtong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-29: gal te mod la char pa mi 'bebs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302a-30: de'i tshe lan lnga brdeg pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-0: klu de dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun gtong @302b bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-1: gang gi tshe char pa mi 'bebs pa de'i tshe klu thams cad la klad pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-2: gal te lan bdun bsnun na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-3: klu'i rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-4: klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rig sngags phung bar bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-5: gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-6: bskus pa tsam gyi mod la gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-7: rims kyis thebs pa rnams kyi dpral ba la thig le bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-11: nyin bzhi pa'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-12: nad kyis zin pa rnams la khrus bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-13: mod la nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-19: 'brum bu rnams las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-24: 'brum bu phra mo mched pa la byugs pa tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-25: gdug pas zin pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis mi gdug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:302b-26: dug gis myos par bgyis pa thams cad la 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-6: rtug skam la bsros nas 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-7: phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-8: mtshogs mar gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te lug gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas lag pa g-yas pa yang byugs te mgo la thal mo brdabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-9: phug gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-10: bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-11: slar cung zad kyang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-12: gnas de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-13: dgos pa sgrub pa chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-14: rkang pa gnyis la byugs te me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-15: me lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas lag pa nas bzung ste rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-16: bdag gi gzhal med khang gi gnas su zhugs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-17: rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-19: de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-21: dpung pa gnyis la byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303a-22: glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-0: tshugs pa ma mchis pa'i gyang @303b du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-1: byin pa gnyis la byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-2: 'bab chu chen po pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-3: mgrin pa la byugs nas nags khung du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-4: nags khung gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-5: ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-6: gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te khar bsrel nas ri sul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-8: skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-10: sman gshong gi gnas gsang ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa 'bye bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-11: de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-14: nags tshang tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags pa dag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-15: gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag 'dzag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-16: bcud srung ba de dag kyang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-17: ji ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-18: snying gar thig le bgyis nas snying la cung zad ci bsam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-19: yid la bsam zhing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:303b-20: lto la thig le bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-0: kha zas dang btung ba'i ston @304a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-1: mo 'dod rgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-2: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-3: rtsib logs gnyis la byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-4: ji ltar bsam zhing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-6: ji ltar yid la bsam pa'i mal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-10: gnad thams cad kyi gnas su byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-11: ji ltar bsam pa'i rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-14: rta'i bzhon pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-15: nyin bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi smra bar gi wang gi ril bu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-16: nyi ma dang po la tshigs su bcad pa stong bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-17: nyin gcig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis nas bklags pa na 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-18: zhag bdun gyis thos pa mang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-20: mi'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-21: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-22: thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-23: ka la pingka'i dbyangs ltar mnyen zhing snyan la rna ba'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-24: bu'i ched du mar dang lhan cig stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304a-26: mo gsham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-5: byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-9: tshes bco lnga la don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas la khro bo'i rgyal pos rang la dbang bskur nas gi'u wang gi ril bu dang spos chab bsres pas khrus bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-10: khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-11: sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-12: nub gsum du khrus bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-16: grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-20: sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-21: lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyi thams cad du 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-22: phyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-23: gi'u wang gi ril bu til mar dang bsres te kha gdong la byugs nas rgyal po'i mdun du mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-24: bu bzhin du phang du 'khyud nas dga' ba chen po 'thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-25: rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-26: lus thog thag tu byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:304b-27: gsad par 'os pa'i lus la yang mtshon gyis phog par mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-3: lus la 'bab par mi 'gyur zhing gzhu 'chag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-4: gi'u wang gi ril bu mgul du btags nas 'brog dgon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-6: nags tshang tshing bgrod dka' bar zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-16: dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-18: dpung pa g-yas pa la btags na; thams cad du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-19: thams cad du mchod gnas chen por yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-20: thams cad du mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po rdzi ba med pas pha rol zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-21: dpung pa g-yon pa la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-25: bu mo thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-28: dgos pa mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-29: byin pa g-yas pa la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305a-30: dub pa ma mchis par dpag tshad stong du mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-0: gi'u wang gi ril bu khar bsres la lag pa g-yas pas yungs kar gyis don yod lcags kyu bzlas nas drangs te tshig gzhan mi smra bar gnas @305b mthon por 'dzegs te phyogs gang du bsam pa'i skye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-3: bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs der yungs kar gyis gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-4: mod la bkug par 'gyur te; mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-5: gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa zhig na yang gang gdon mi 'tshal bar de zhag gsum gyis mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-8: lag pa g-yon pa la gi'u wang gi ril bu btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-9: gang du reg par nor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-19: lhab lhub de dag thams cad bkug nas mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-20: ci 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-21: bya tshang du zhugs nas tshang mang gi sgor thal mo brdabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-23: 'tshed pa'i kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-24: gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-25: spos 'tshong gi tshong khang du mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-26: tshong khang gi yo byad thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-27: chang tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-28: chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-29: bang ba'i sgor thal mo brdabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-31: bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:305b-32: bu ram gyi khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-2: gang du 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-3: grong khyer gyi sgor mun tshab tshub na thal mo brdabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-4: grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad gnyid dkrogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-7: mtshon cha mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-9: go cha rnams rengs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-14: sems can gdug pa thams cad bcings pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-17: dung la byugs nas mthon por bus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-18: sgra gang du grags pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-25: nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-26: grong khyer gyi sgor bus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-29: mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-32: gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-33: ra lug gi lhas su bus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-34: ra lug gi 'o ma 'phrog bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-35: gar 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-36: skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus su bus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306a-37: thams cad sgren mor gyur nas gos thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-0: rdza rnga la byugs @306b te khyams mthon po'i steng du brdungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-3: ser ba thams cad bcings pa dang bshig par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-5: dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu ser ba bkag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-6: grong khyer ram yul 'khor mtha' dag tu bus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-10: 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-14: 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-16: mu ge'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-17: gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-18: thams cad la sbyar bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-19: de nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-20: rgyas pa nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-22: gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-23: mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-28: brjed byed thams cad brlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-29: rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:306b-30: gos gtsang ma bgos la spos dri zhim pos bsgos nas byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag cing /
