K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-1: cad la lhag par brtse ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-2: snying rje chen pos snying gdungs pas sbyin sreg gi las 'di bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-5: shing 'o ma can nam ji ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-6: de dag gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar la 'bras yos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-13: mar dang bsres pas sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-14: don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de nas don yod zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-15: don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-16: de nas sbyin sreg gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin pa'i mod kho nar dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu yams kyi nad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-20: mu ge'i dgon pa mi bzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-22: gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-24: mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-28: gcan gzan gdug pa can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-31: gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307a-33: dpag tshad brgyar khor yug tu rims mi 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-5: gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-16: sdigs pa rnams kyis mi tshugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-18: sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-19: shin tu lo legs shing mdangs dga' la skye bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-20: mi mang pos rab tu gang zhing me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-21: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-24: lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-25: shin tu ro dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-34: 'bras bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-35: phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na yid du mi mchi ba'i reg pa myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-36: yul de na dge sbyong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-44: bu mo rnams rtag tu nad ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-46: yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:307b-48: snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308a-5: lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par bsrung ba'i phyir rtag tu srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308a-7: sba ba'i phyir dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308a-10: bde legs su bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308a-11: rgyal po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas te yongs su skyong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308a-15: gdug pa thams cad zlog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308a-19: dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308a-22: lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308a-26: lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad kyis yul de legs par srung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308a-28: dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu sems can thams cad yongs su srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308a-38: bu mo thams cad la srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-1: zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-2: sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-4: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-6: sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byin par ston par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-7: sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i don du nyi ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-8: zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang bcas pa legs par 'byor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-9: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun du skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-12: bu mo thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-14: yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-15: yang nas yang du blta bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-16: de nas des sbyin sreg gi thal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-17: dri chu skyo ma bgyis te phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang bskur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-18: mtshams chen po bcad pa bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-19: nad gyis zin pa thams cad kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-20: rims thams cad la thig le bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:308b-21: rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-2: thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-3: sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-5: phyag sbal na mchis pa'i gos la bskus na ral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-7: dug gis myos pa thams cad la bskus na gdug par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-8: me dgug pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-9: de nas padma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir padma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po brjod par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-11: ma bsgrubs par las brgya stong bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-12: tshes grangs rgyu skar bzang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-13: shin tu bkra shis mchog dge la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-14: legs bar khrus bgyis gos gtsang bgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-15: byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-16: sems can kun las brtse ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-17: snying rje dam bas brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-18: don yod zhags pa'i rig sngags tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-19: grub pa bla med cho ga'i rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-20: bklags pas las rnams thams cad dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-21: 'grub par bgyid de som nyi med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-22: 'jig rten bla ma'i snying po dag de bzhin gang dag rtag brjod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-23: lus can rtag tu mchog sbyin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-25: ji ltar gangg'a'i bye snyed kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309a-26: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-0: bsod nams @309b phung po khri phrag skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-2: sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-3: smyung ba bgyis nas bzlas brjod gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-4: mkhas pa'i mis ni brjod bgyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-5: dge slong pha dang dge slong ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-6: dge bsnyen pha mas de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-7: bde ba can du myur du mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-8: sdug bsngal mi bzang myong 'gyur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-9: nyon mongs pa las thar par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-10: rtag tu sangs rgyas byang sems dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-11: mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-12: de nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-13: bzlas brjod kyi ni las bgyis na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-15: don yod zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-16: mdun du ba lci'i dkyil 'khor bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-17: gru bzhi kho ra khor yug tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-18: tshon rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-19: gru bzhi lhag par thig gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-20: ngos bzhi rnams su sgo bzhi dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-21: dbus nas ngos bzhir gshis su dbab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-22: tsandan dkar pos bri ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-24: 'dab brgya gur gum gyis gtor cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-25: padma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-26: ma zhom pa yi bum pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-27: spos chab kyis ni bkang ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-28: yungs kar ldan pa gzhag par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-29: aa ga ru yi bdug pa dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-30: bum pa gang ba dgod par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-31: me tog sna tshogs brgyan par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:309b-32: mchod yon snod kyang bzhi gzhag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-2: gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-3: legs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-4: gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-5: dkar gsum zas ni 'tshal nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-6: dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-7: dus gsum bzlas brjod bgyi ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-8: don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-9: dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-11: mngon sum skyil mo krung bcas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-12: bzlas brjod phyag rgya bcings nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-13: bgrang phreng dag ni blang bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-14: mdzub mo dag ni mthe bo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-15: brkyang nas zhi zhing dul ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-16: yid kyis byams sems mnyam par gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-17: ting 'dzin brtan pas lus snyoms par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-18: legs par bzhag ste zhi bar lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-19: tshig gzhan mi smra bzlas brjod bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-20: bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-21: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te phyag bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-22: sa chen po yang g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-23: brtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-24: sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa zhabs mthong ba tsam du bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-25: ji tsam na khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310a-26: lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g-yo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-0: @310b 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-1: rig sngags 'chang de yang cher snying dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-3: shin tu rab tu dga' bas spu zing zhes bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du blta bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-5: gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ngo g-yas pa nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-6: mig sgyur bar bgyid cing kun tu legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-7: zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-8: rig sngags 'chang gis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob nas lus yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba sa ya phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-12: shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-16: snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-17: mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-18: lus yongs su dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-19: yid yongs su dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-21: skra skya bo spangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:310b-22: sems can thams cad la lta ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311a-1: gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston cing dbugs 'byin par bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311a-2: lag pa g-yas pa spyi bor bzhag nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing la blta ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311a-9: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311a-20: gnod sbyin dgug pa'am; srin po dgug pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311a-26: ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311a-27: grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311a-31: yul gyi bdag po nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311a-32: dpung chen po rab tu gzhom pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311a-34: rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311a-35: dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311b-0: ji ltar gang du @311b 'tshal bar yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311b-1: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311b-2: rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311b-3: sems can thams cad la lta ba sgrib pa dang bral pa dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311b-4: mig sman sgrub par 'tshal bas des zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la ldong ros kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod kyi nang du stsal te tsandan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311b-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas legs par khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bsgos nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311b-6: don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshams bcing bas mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o; ;khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311b-9: rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311b-10: bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la zangs kyi snod 'bar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:311b-13: de blangs nas mig la byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-0: nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar @312a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-2: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-3: rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-4: phug gi gnas phye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-5: gter byung ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-6: lha'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-7: gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-16: mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-19: bco lnga la tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-20: bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas lag pa g-yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-21: dri med 'phags kyi lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa yang dag par lta ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob nas tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa stong du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312a-23: bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-0: de @312b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gleng bar mdzad pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-2: bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bsu ba'i slad du lha'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-3: skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-4: padma snang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-5: de nas rang gi lus rdo rje sra ba bdag nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhin thob par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-6: rig sngags 'chang des spos chab des bum pa bkang nas lan drug khri nyis stong bzlas brjod bgyis te byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur pas khrus bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-7: khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la lus rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-12: gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-14: klu thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-15: 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:312b-16: dran pa tsam mam sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:313a-1: cad babs nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:313a-5: yang dag pa ma lags pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:313a-6: skal pa dang ldan pa'am; skal ba dang mi ldan pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:313a-12: lo legs pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:313a-13: de la sogs te las bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:313a-14: bran bzhin du las thams cad rtag tu bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:313a-15: yang na 'jig rten so sor bsgral bar 'tshal ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:313a-16: thams cad dbang du gyur nas bzhag par 'tshal lam /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318a-5: shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318a-10: spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318a-15: chu dang lhan cig sbyar te sha kha ra btab la legs par btags pa las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318a-17: ae na ya'i pags pa bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318a-18: phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318a-19: phyag bzhi gcig na padma thogs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-1: gdan padma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-4: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og tu ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-8: de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos sum phrugs su bsgos la chos brgyad nas tshes bcu lnga'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-9: spos sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor byug par bya zhing tshon sna lngas bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-11: rig sngags kyi lha pus mo btsugs te gyen du lta ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-17: dkyil 'khor khor yug tu padma bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-18: gra bzhir spos kyis bkang ba gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-20: gtor ma dang bum pa gang ba gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-21: dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-22: mchod yon gyi snod gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-23: me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya zhing aa ga ru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-24: tsandan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-25: spos sna brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:318b-26: 'phan gdugs bzang po sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-1: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du zhal shar phyogs su bstan la mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-2: ras kyi tshon skud sna lnga pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-3: srid du khru bcu drug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-4: thor to gcig tu gser gyi yang mig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-5: thor to gcig tu mu tig gi chun kor btags te sbrul 'khyil ba bzhin du bskyil la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste gtsang mas gos gtsang mas g-yogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-6: rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bcing pa byas la bdag bsrung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-7: khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas la dkyil 'khor bcing pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-9: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzhin 'dzum gyis rgyas par byas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te mi smra bar yungs kar 'bru re re nas bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad brjod nas ras kyi srang bu'i steng du gtor bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-10: stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang ras kyi srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-12: legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-15: khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa grub kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319a-16: longs la dgos pa thams cad byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-0: khyod kyis yid @319b bzhin gyi nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa padma grub pas 'jig rten pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-1: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-3: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-4: spos des dpag tshad drug tsam du khyab par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-5: gang la dri mnam pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-6: sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-7: sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-11: phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jug par 'gyur ro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-12: lus thams cad dri ma med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-13: sems can thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro; ;de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa de blangs la zangs kyi gab tshe bzang po'i nang du bcug ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-14: nam dgos pa byung ba'i tshe gtsang mas khrus legs par byas te blang bar bya zhing dgos pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-15: nyin re zhing dus gsum du mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:319b-16: rig sngags 'chang de yang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus yongs su dag par sngon gyi rig sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-2: shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du padma'i snying po la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-3: rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-4: byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du tshe bskal ba brgya phrag stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang gang gis mthong ba tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-6: sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-8: brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-11: btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-16: bran mo dang bcas te las byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-17: sna ma'i me tog rnying pa de bsdus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-28: yungs kar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar ba'i ril bu ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-29: dug med par byed pa'i mchog padma zhes bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-30: thog mar grags pa dang dpal du byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320a-31: nad thams cad sel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-0: rims @320b nad thams cad nye bar sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-8: bskus na bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-9: nad de dag thams cad la khrus byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-10: sdig pa sel to zhes thub pas gsung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-12: rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-13: thig le byas te g-yul ngor song na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-14: thams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-15: bud med rnams dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-16: dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-21: gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba byas pa dag kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-22: zas za ba dang khrus byed pa na thig le'i byug pa rtag tu byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-23: de thams cad las 'gro ba rnams bde bar thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-24: zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-25: klad pa'i nad mi bzad pa la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-28: mig sman gyi thur mas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-31: lto ba na ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-33: rtsib logs na ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-35: yan lag dang nyin lag na ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-37: dbang du bya ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-38: lag mthil la bsku bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-39: nad tshabs po cho la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-41: gnod sbyin gyi gdon bsal ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:320b-42: sna nas gtang ba'i las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-2: rgyas thebs pa rnams la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-5: chu dron dang lan tshva bsres pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-6: khyim [?] bar bya ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-7: 'bras yos dang gsum sbyar bas zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-8: thams cad du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-11: ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste dri chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag cing 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-12: mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-16: gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-17: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-18: khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-19: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-21: rtsod pa rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-22: g-yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-24: gzhan gyi dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-25: gal te brgya byin rang dang lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321a-26: mi rnams kyis lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-0: padma la lan brgya rtsa @321b brgyad bzlas te brgya byin gyi ming nas brjod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhing dri chab kyang dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-3: yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te shing aarka'i me sbar la tshes bcu bzhi la sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-4: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-5: brgya byin lha'i dbang po dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug ste bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-6: brgya byin gyi go 'phang ma gtogs pa gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-9: tshangs pa rdog pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-10: brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-11: tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug ste mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-12: yid la ci 'dod pa sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-13: gu gul la lan dgu bcu bzlas te khyab 'jug la 'dug cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-14: chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-15: khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-16: gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-17: hi ran n+ya ka shi bu la yang sbyin par byed cing khyab 'jug chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:321b-18: dbang phyug chen po'i zhal mthong bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-0: rna ba g-yas par lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs @322a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-1: kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas spyi bor gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-2: gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing aarka'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-3: de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-4: de nas dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-5: 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-6: mchog gang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-7: nag po chen po dgug par 'dod pas gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te khrag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-8: yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas nag po chen po'i steng du gtor na khugs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-9: bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-10: gar mngags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-11: 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-12: gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo 'byed par 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-13: thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-14: mi smra bar mtshan mo'i dus mtshams gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-15: mtshan mo'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322a-18: nyin par rgyu ba'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-7: mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-8: las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-9: thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis rtag tu mdun na nye bar gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-10: mtshan mo longs spyod par gzhal med khang thams cad sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-11: gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te khrus legs par byas nas bden par smra zhing byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas sems can thams cad la rtag tu brtse ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-12: snying rje chen pos lhag par dmigs te bzlas brjod rtag tu bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-13: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-14: de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-23: sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-24: khyim srung bar 'dod pas aarga'i yam sreg shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-26: yungs mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-27: khyim chen po srung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:322b-32: mi mdza' ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-9: bu mo'i mi ngas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-10: lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-14: dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-18: gu gul gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-24: ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-25: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla ba nya la me tog dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-27: rgya spos rnams yungs mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-28: rgyal po blon po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-36: ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-37: shing aa pa marga'i yam sreg shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323a-40: me tog dkar po rnams las lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323b-0: yul gru stong thob par 'gyur @323b ro; ;'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323b-1: sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323b-2: padma'i sdong po'i yam sreg shing rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323b-3: mtshan mo zad pa dang di na ra brgyad brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323b-8: yungs kar bsres te shing seng ldeng gi me sbar la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323b-9: log 'dren thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323b-10: zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la smyung ba byas te gtsang mas khrus legs par byas la gos dkar po bgos te tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323b-14: yungs kar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323b-15: nam phyed kyi dus su gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas zong lnga stong sbyin par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323b-21: rig sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:323b-22: gdong du mig blta bar mi bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-2: rkang pa'i drung du snod por nas btud de rig sngags 'chang 'gum mo zhes zer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-3: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-4: de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe nam phyed na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-6: dgos pa thams cad byed cing bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-7: zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la gang na gter yod pa der song ste stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma'i cho ga yang gzhag par bya zhing 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa byas la sna ma'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-10: mar bsres pa rnams las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas te chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-11: yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa la brdabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-12: de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te blangs la dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya zhing lhag ma rang gis blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-13: ba ru ra'i shing gi me sbar la til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-15: mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-16: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324a-17: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-0: nor dang 'bru dang @324b bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-1: dbyig dang gser dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-2: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-4: tsam pa ka'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-7: mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bud med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-10: bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro; ;'bras phub lan tshva dang ldan pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-11: rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-12: aa ga ti'i shing gis me sbar la sbrang rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-14: aarga'i me tog las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-15: nyin re zhing 'di na ra brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro; ;pa la sha'i yam sreg shing dang 'bras yos las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-16: gser brgya phrag stong 'thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-17: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya zhing bgo bsha' byas na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-18: tshes bco lnga zla ba nya la smyung ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-19: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-20: chu klung chen po'i nang rked pa nub tsam du zhugs te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:324b-21: yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas khros pas chu klung de la brdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-0: de nas chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas rin po che mang po @325a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-1: dag sbyin par byed blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-2: phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-3: tshes bco lnga zla ba nya la smyung ba byas te nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas aa pa marga'i yam sreg shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-6: sra rtsi bog bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la rang gi ming gis sbyin sreg stong byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-7: sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing nad thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-8: gnod pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-9: phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-10: mi mdza' ba thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-15: mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-21: tsandan dkar po bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-24: tshes bcu bzhi la k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-25: lan tshva sna bdun bsres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-26: shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing yungs kar la bsres pas drag shul spyod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325a-27: char mi 'bab pa'i tshe padma dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-1: ji srid 'dod pa de srid du char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-3: ha cang char che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-5: mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-6: sprin la mngon du phyogs te gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-9: ser ba rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-10: gzhan gyi sde mnan pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-12: 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-13: pha rol gyi dpung zlog pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-14: sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-16: shing aarga'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-17: aarga'i lo ma dang mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-18: phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-19: nags su 'gro ba'i tshe ku mu da dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-22: mar bsres pas nags kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur zhing sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-23: shing pa la sha'i me sbar te na le sham brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-28: nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:325b-30: k'a ra ni k'a ra'i me tog dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326a-20: mtshams med pa lnga byang bar 'gyur bar bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326a-21: ras khru do gru bzhi lham pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326a-26: shin tu sbyangs pa la ri mo mkhan mi smra ba'i dka' thub can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326a-27: bsnyen gnas la gnas pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326a-28: zas dkar gsum za ba dus gsum du khrus byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326a-29: lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsi'i snod gsar pa bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-0: pir @326b gsar pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhengs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-2: skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-3: ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-4: ae na ya'i pags pa bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-5: phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-6: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-10: dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-11: zhal g-yas pa'i thor tshugs la zla tshes kyis brgyan pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-13: phyag gnyis thur du kun tu zhal gyi phyag rgya bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-15: phyag gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-18: gsum pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i glegs bam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-19: bzhi pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa zhags pa tha mal pa 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-21: drug pa na ril ba spyi blugs /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-23: brgyad pa na me tog sna tshogs kyis snod thogs par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-25: sku me tog sna tshogs kyi bkra bas mdzes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:326b-26: ri po ta la'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu mdzes pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-2: rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-3: padma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-4: rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-6: chu shing gi yal gas mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-7: g-yas logs kyi steng na nyi ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-9: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag lag na me tog sna tshogs mang po thogs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-10: ri padma 'dra ba zhig snying pos mdzes par byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-13: mtsho nyas gang zhing chu srin ma ka ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-17: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i ri de'i steng du padma'i gdan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-19: g-yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-20: g-yon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-21: nang gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-22: g-yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma lus btud de 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-23: g-yon du dri med 'gro lag pa dbugs 'byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-24: nor bzang pus mo btsugs pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327a-25: padma'i snying po'i dbus su gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po khros pa'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-0: lag pa bzhi pa lag @327b na mtshon cha thogs pa ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-6: de nas 'og gi g-yas g-yon du rdo rje'i zom chen po lag na rdo rje'i tshogs mang po 'dug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-12: g-yas phyogs kyi mtsho dang ri'i bar du brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-14: g-yon phyogs su rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-15: de'i 'og tu pho nya mo padma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa 'brel par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-16: lha mo chen mo dpal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-21: lo tog gi lha mo bya'o; ;dbang phyug gi drung du khro gnyer can bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-22: dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos dkar mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-23: ri dang pho nya mo'i bar du srin mo ral pa gcig ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-24: ri'i khor yug gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spros pa bya zhing ljon shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-27: mtshe'u mdzes pa me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-32: g-yon du gsar ba chen po lnga bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-33: 'og tu klu'i rgyal po lnga bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:327b-34: thams cad brag gi stan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-0: lag na rin po che'i me tog gi @328a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-1: phor ba thogs te bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs te lag na me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-3: pog phor thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-4: steng gi bang rim du thub pa chen po rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-6: 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-7: ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la tshe rabs brgya stong du mnar med pa bsags pa dang /
