K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-10: sems can de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-11: sems can dag pa rnams lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-12: dad pas mos pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-13: dkon mchog gsum mchod pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-14: tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-15: phan yon mang po dag tu shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur zhing de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-17: ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328a-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dngos su mthong ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328b-0: @328b ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing sku yang ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328b-1: nyam thag pa tsam gyi mod la sku ston par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328b-2: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzungs kyi snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328b-4: nad tshabs chen pos gzir ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328b-6: sdug bsngal brgya stong gis dkrugs pa de dag thams cad mthong ba tsam gyi mod la nad thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328b-8: gnod pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing sgrib pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328b-10: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa dag kyang mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328b-11: ras kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang po mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328b-13: sil snyan dkrol pa mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328b-16: ba dan gyis legs par brgyan par byas te grong khyer chen po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:328b-22: ras kyi sku gzugs bzhugs pa tsam gyi mod la 'thab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-0: gzhan gyi dpung gis 'jigs pa zhi @329a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-14: mi mang po bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-16: yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-17: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-18: 'di mthong ba tsam gyis shi 'phos nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-19: bskal pa stong phrag bdun du tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-20: padma'i 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-21: padma rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-22: ri mo'i sku gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-24: de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-27: me tog gi skyed mos tshal lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329a-29: khang bzangs gzhi dag cing sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-4: phyag dar gyi phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-9: thod pa'i rus pas gang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-10: shi ba'i ro rnams spangs pa'i sa gzhi'i phyogs na mtshe'u dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-12: 'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-13: nye ba na chu yod cing shin tu mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-17: shar phyogs gang na ljon shing gis mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-20: gzi byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed nas chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-21: yungs kar la bzlas te kun tu gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-22: sa gzhi de lta bu sbyang ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-24: khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor nas kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad phyogs bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-26: mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-29: log 'dren thams cad kyi skad cig kyang mi gnas par phyogs bzhir byer te dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-32: sdang ba'i gcan gzan khro bo gang yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lha thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-33: gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:329b-34: gru bzhi lham pa ngos re re zhing khru sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-1: pa gru bzhi cha mnyam zhing mdzes la sgo bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-3: 'bras kyi phye ma'i tshon sna bzhir sbyar la de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-4: tshon sna lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab nas tsandan dkar po'i phur bu btab ste zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-5: tshes bco lnga'i tshes grangs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-6: rgyu skar bzang po gdams te dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-14: nam mkha'i kha dog gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-16: mig sman gyi kha dog gis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-17: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa med par cha rnam par mdzes shing gsal bar pir gsar pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-19: snod gsar pas bri bar bya ste; dkyil 'khor gyi snying por padma 'dab ma stong pa khor khor yug stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-20: padma'i phreng ba tshon gyis mdzes pa bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-21: de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan thub pa chen po sh'akya'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-23: 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-24: g-yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330a-25: g-yon du phyag na rdo rje rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa bzhin khro gnyer can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-0: @330b 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-4: dkar mo chen mo lag na dbyug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-5: ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-6: de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig pa mche ba gtsigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-7: thod pa'i phreng ba thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-8: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-10: lag pa g-yas pa g-yon gnyis na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-12: g-yas pa'i gung mo lha dang log 'dren la bsdigs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-13: g-yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i cha lugs 'chang ba ral pa'i tho tshugs kyis bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-14: 'od dpag med kyi thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-15: g-yas g-yon du dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-16: de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-17: lha mo dbyangs can ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-20: lo tog gi lha mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-21: 'bras bu dang me tog gi lha mo bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-22: de'i 'og tu khor yug tu gshin rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-24: rlung lha la sogs pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-25: ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'i drang srong gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-26: grar rgyal po bzhi go cha bgos pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:330b-27: dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dang bar bar du lcags kyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-2: phyi rol tu tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-5: tshangs pa'i drung du lha dbyangs ldan ma khros pa'i gzugs can no; ;de dag gnyis kyi bar du dbyug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-6: ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-7: grva gcig tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-8: grva gcig tu shi b'a ba ha gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-9: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo rta mgrin 'jigs su rung ba'i mig can gzhag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-10: lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po ki li ki li zhes bya ba rdo rje rnam par 'dren pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-14: nub phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo padma rigs mdzes ma lag pa padma'i rtse mo nas 'dzin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-15: byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po zom zhes bya ba'i tshogs lag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-17: de nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas gser gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ste dar las bcings la rnam pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-18: me tog gi phreng bas brgyan nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste steng du sna ma'i me tog gi gdu bu gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331a-23: pog phor bzhi bzhag cing aa ga ru'i bdug pas bdug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-0: tshon sna lnga'i ras kyi @331b srad bu mchod phyir gyi srad bu tshad du byas la gser gyi yang mig rtse gsum can gdags par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-1: thor to gcig tu me tog padma'i gdub 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-3: rin po ches spras pa zlum por bskyil ba bum pa'i steng du bzhag la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-4: bsnyen bkur byas te yungs dkar la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te de la gdab par bya'o; ;tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-6: gla rtsi'i phye mas bgos la bgo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-7: sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-8: zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhag par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-9: gser dngul gyi mchod yon gyi snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-10: spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-11: spos chu dkar pos bkang ba brgyad gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-13: dri sna tshogs kyis bkang ba brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-16: spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-17: gtor ma la sogs pa dbul ba sna brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-18: dbul ba sna drug cu rtsa bzhi ba rnams sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-23: btung ba ngan pa spangs te gtsang mas gtsang ma sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-24: me tog sna tshogs kyi gcal dgram par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-28: ba dan gyis brgyan par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:331b-29: pog por sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhag par bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs mang pos bdug par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-0: spos sna brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar @332a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-1: gyi mar me bltam par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu padma'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-3: rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-4: dus gsum du khrus byas la gos gsum bgo bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-5: grogs gtsang ma bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-6: 'jug pa'i cho ga byas pa nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pos dbang bskur ba'i bar tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing 'jig rten mgon pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-7: padma'i rigs padma 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dngos grub la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-8: gang bsam pa thams cad de kho na bzhin byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-9: dam tshig thams cad la don yod par 'jug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-10: chos nyid thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos la dam tshig grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-11: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-12: bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-14: mi'i dpal thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-18: srin po'i tshogs kyi bgo skal la dbang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332a-20: gsang sngags la brten par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332b-3: dbang du bya bas mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332b-4: gang dag de lta bu byed pa de nyid kyi lus sam mgo la brgya phrag stong 'gyur du 'bab par 'gyur zhing gzhan gyis phyir bzlas cing dgrol bar mi nus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332b-5: rig sngags 'chang des dgrol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332b-6: de nas rig sngags 'chang des ri mo'i gzugs de dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas don yod pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing bar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332b-7: khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332b-8: de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332b-9: bum pa de yang 'bar la ras kyi sku gzugs de yang kha dog sna bdun du 'bar zhing shas cher 'gul bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332b-10: khro bo'i rig sngags 'chang snying dga' bar 'gyur zhing ras kyi sku gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332b-13: khyod kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub cing khyod kyis zhags pa 'di yang grub /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:332b-14: khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhags pa'i mchog 'di yang grub kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-0: de dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa chog grub nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba de @333a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-1: blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te rgyu skar rgyal la khrus byas pa'am zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes grangs shis pa la khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-2: dngos po lnga'i bdag nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur te rna ba lnga yongs su dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-3: mig lnga yongs su dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-4: sna lnga yongs su dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-5: lce lnga yongs su dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-6: rnam par shes pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-7: dbang po lnga yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-8: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing rtag tu sku ston bzhed par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-10: rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-11: lha thams cad kyang de la srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-15: tshangs pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-16: rgyal po bzhi dpung gi 'khor dang bcas te sa'i phyogs der 'ong bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-17: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333a-23: gsang ba ba brgya stong phrag du ma srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-4: shes pa don yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-5: shes rab don yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-8: brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur zhing sbyin pa don yod pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-9: bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-11: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-12: rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa la mkhas par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-13: rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-16: pha rol gnon pa don yod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma sa ya snyed sa ya brgya phrag brgya stong drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-19: sems can thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-20: bkur sti bya bar 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-21: mchod rten gyi snying po dang 'dra bar phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-22: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:333b-23: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas @334a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-1: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te btud nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-2: bcom ldan 'das; bdag la padma'i rigs la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-3: rig sngags chen po'i rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de bdag gis yongs su bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das la blta bzhin du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-6: na ma stree ya da dh'a nu ga ta pra ti shathi te bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-7: sarba buddha po dhi satva bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-8: na ma pra tye ka buddharya shra ba ka sam ghe bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-9: aa t'i t'a nu ga t'a pra tyud pan ne bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-10: na ma:samya kasam ga t'a n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-11: na ma:sam myakasam pra ti pan n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-12: na ma: sh'a ra dva ti bu tra ya ma h'a ma ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-13: na ma: a'arya mee tre ya bra mu khe bha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-14: ma h'a bo dhi satva a'arya ga na ba re bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-15: na ma: a'arya aa mi t'a bh'a ya ta th'a ga t'a ya aarha te samyakasam buddh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334a-16: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-0: na ma:a'ary'a @334b pa lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-3: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-4: ma h'a ri shi a'a rya gan pa re bhy'a: na m skri tv'a a'arya ba lo ki te shva ra mu khong+g'i rannam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-5: aa mo gha r'a dzan n'a ma hri da yan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-6: ta th'a ga t'a sam mu kham bha shi ti ma h'a tav'am pa ram dhye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-7: aa hi mi d'a n'i m'a bartti ya shya mi siddhyam tu me mantra pa d'a:sarba k'arya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-8: sarbba bha ye bhyo ma ma sarbba satv'a n'a nytsa rakasha bha wa tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-13: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-17: pa ra ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-39: bi tsa la bi tsa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-40: ae ta ta ae ta ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-46: ma h'a pa shu pa ti be sha dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-54: aom k'a ra ma h'a pra hma be sha dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-64: ra shmi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti mandi ta sh'a r'i ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-66: t'a pa t'a pa bha ga w'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:334b-73: aa bhya rtsi ta tsa ra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-5: de ba ri shi n'a ya ka ma hu bi bi dha be sha dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-18: ba ra d'a ya ka sa manta aa ba lo ki te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-26: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-27: rakasha rakasha mam sarbba satva shtsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-36: r'a dza tsoo ra ta ska ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-46: ba la bo dhyam ga tsa tu ra a'arya sa da tya sam pra k'a sha ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-51: ma h'a ta mo na dha k'a ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-52: bi dha ma na bi dha ma na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-53: sha ta pa ra mi t'a pa ri p'u ra ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-59: ae ne ya tsarmma kri pa ri ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-60: ae hye hi a'i shva ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-61: ma he shva ra ma h'a bhu ta ga na bhanydza ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-67: rbashi ya ni b'a si na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-68: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka shve ta ya dznye pa b'i ta ratna mu ku ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-70: sarbba dzny'a shi ra si kri ta ma ku ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335a-71: ma had bhu ta ka ma l'a lam kri ta ka ra ta la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-0: dhya na sa m'a dhi bi moksha aa @335b pra kambya; ba hu stva santa ti pa ri p'a tsa ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-1: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-2: sarbba karmma s'a ba ra ni bi sho dha ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-3: sarbba bya dhi pra mo tsa ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-4: sarbba a'a sh'a pa ri p'u ra ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-5: sarbba satva sa m'a shv'a sa ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di bshad pa tsam gyis 'khor mang po ri dang nags tshal du bcas pa 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-8: 'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung bar gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-9: lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-13: mand'a ra ba'i me tog gi char chen pos pus mo nub pa tsam bab par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-15: pheg rdob pa'i sgra dag kyang byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-16: mtho ris kyi lha dag gis kyang nam mkha' las bcom ldan 'das la rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-17: lhab lhub dag gi char phab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-18: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-26: gtsang ma de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-27: sems can dag pa chen po lags so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:335b-28: yid bzhin gi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di bshad cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-0: dngos grub mchog gi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di @336a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-1: bshad pas rin po che'i char chen po 'bab bo zhes zer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-2: de nas de'i phyir dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya zhing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing zas dkar gsum za bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dpal lha mo bzhag ste mchod pa byas la yungs kar 'bru re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpal lha mo la bsnun pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-4: tshes bcu bzhi nas bco lnga'i bar du dpal lha mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-5: mtshams med pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-6: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-7: sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-9: zhi bar bya ba la aa ga ru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-10: tsandan gyi bdug spos bsregs la thal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-12: seng ldeng gi phur bu gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-13: rims thams cad la bu mo gtsang mas bkal pa'i srad bu la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-14: rims thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-15: nad thams cad la mar dang til mar la bzlas te zangs kyi snod du sangs rgyas la phul ba'i sna ma'i me tog snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336a-16: padma ze ba dang bcas pa btab ste bcos pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-1: sna nas gtang ba'i las bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-2: nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-4: mar dang sbrang rtsi la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te lus la bsku zhing tshigs mas dril la lus kyi dri ma byin par byas te gong bu las gzugs brnyan byas la lan bdun bzlas te mtshon gyis btab nas dug sbyar ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-6: gsang sngags thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-8: srung ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te de bzhin du mdud pa por ba byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-9: srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-13: 'byung po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-14: lto na ba la tshva chu 'jam tsam la lan bdun bzlas te byin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-17: chu la lan bdun bzlas te byin na dug thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi gdug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-18: mig na ba la srad bu dkar po rna ba la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-19: mi nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-20: sdang ba'i dug mi bzad pa la 'jim pa la bzlas te byug pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:336b-22: so na ba la ka ra b'i ra'i so shing ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-0: shing ba gu'i so shing la bzlas te @337a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-1: zos na so nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-2: mtshams bcad pa thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-3: tshon sna lnga'i srad bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la btags te phyogs bzhir btsugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-4: mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-5: gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-6: gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-9: mgul pa 'gags pa la sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling ldan par byas te byug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-10: mgul 'gags pa la blngag pa byas na; mgul 'gags pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-11: mig nad la spos chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-12: shing pa la sha'i chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-13: pa la sha'i me tog gis bkru bar bya ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-14: shing mngar gyi chu la lan bdun bzlas te bkrus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-15: mig nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-16: rna ba na ba la til mar dang shu ti zangs kyi snod du btsos pas rna ba bkang na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-17: rna nad las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-21: mi snyan pa thams cad la chu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkru ba byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-22: thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337a-28: mi mdza' ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337b-0: g-yul ngo thams cad du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil @337b 'khor byas la bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag ste gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la aa ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337b-1: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo 'di mchod de bklags pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337b-3: thams cad byams pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337b-4: byams pa'i yid du 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337b-6: chu des bdag nyid la kun tu gtor te tsandan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te snying gar thig le byas te rtag tu dran par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337b-7: mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337b-11: shing aarga'i me tog mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337b-12: khyim srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337b-13: 'byung po'i gdon thams cad las srung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:337b-14: yang las thams cad la nor bu sgrub pa'i rdzas 'di dag bsags la cha mnyam par byas te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas las thams cad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338a-0: su man da rnams phye ma zhib mor byas te char pa'i chus @338a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338a-2: gur gum sbyar ba'i chus brlan te brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar nor bur byas te yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas aa ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs la de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du bzhag ste ras kyis g-yogs la grib mar bskams te blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338a-3: yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzla bar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338a-4: khro bo'i rgyal po lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te mgo blos bzung na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338a-5: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338a-6: rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338a-8: lha thams cad kyang gzi byin 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338a-9: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338a-10: tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338a-11: phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba thams cad kyang rtag tu mthun par byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-0: g-yeng byed kyis mi tshugs shing thams cad @338b 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-5: dge ba'i tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-7: rtag tu ston pa bzhed par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-8: thams cad du dus thams cad na rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-9: skal pa bzang po thogs pa med pa yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-11: glang po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-13: dmag thams cad las rgyal ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-16: pha rol gnon pa chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-17: rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo chen po grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-22: brjed byed kyi mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-23: nam yang de la rmi lam ngan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-24: ltas ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-25: byis pa rnams la mgul du btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-29: bcos pa 'phrog pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:338b-30: nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-1: ska rags gsar pa btags te khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gsar pa bgos te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-2: skal pa bzang po mchog dang ldan par byed cing bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-3: khyim thab dang rtag tu rjes su mthun par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-4: khye'u dang bu mo yod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-6: thams cad dga' bas lta bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-7: de la bud med kyi skyon yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-8: phyi ma la de lta bu'i bud med kyi lus mi thob par shes par bya ste; shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-10: thams cad du srung ba byas par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-14: dug byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-15: nor bu 'di btags pas dug med par 'gyur zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-16: tshor ba skye bar mi 'gyur zhing bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-17: rlung dang sprin dang ser ba gnon na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-18: chu la lan bdun bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-20: ser pa thams cad mnan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339a-22: bal po se'u'i lcug mas bzlog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339b-0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar don @339b yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te nor bu chu dron las btang ba byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339b-1: 'di bklags pa tsam gyis tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur zhing thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339b-4: btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du byar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:339b-5: lus bsku ba byas na gang du zhugs pa de thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-10: damshta ka r'a la ma h'a te dza /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-12: pi lu la dza na ba ra da ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-13: ma h'a pa shu pa ti bi shadha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-15: pra ba ra pu n-ya sam bha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-16: su ga ta dha na sa m'a dha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-17: sa manta aa ba lo ki ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-18: a'i shva ra ma he shva ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-20: roo dra pra la da ma ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-21: kro dha r'a dza ma h'a be ga dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-22: sa ma sa ma ma h'a stha ma prapta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-23: tsandra s'urya aa ti re ka pra bha sa la ma la sarba ma la bi sho dha ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-24: sarbba ri shi ga na sa nta ti ma h'a ma he shva ra r'u pa dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-25: aa mi t'a bha dzi na lam kri ta dza ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-26: dakshi na tsandra lam kri ta shir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-28: sarbba yaksha raksha sa bhu ta ga na bha na dza ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-30: ta ra ga na sa m'a lam kri ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-31: na ksha tra m'a la sarbba bigh'an bi n'a sh'a na ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-32: pa ra mee tri ci tta ma h'a k'a ra ni ksha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-34: pa ri p'urna manda la soo mya mu kha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-35: sha ta pa ra mi t'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-38: ae ni ya tsarma ni ba san /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-39: bya ghra tsa rmod ta ri ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-41: sarbba th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-42: tri ne tra tri sh'u la dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-44: aa mo gha p'a sha haste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-45: ya ma wa ru na ku be ra r'u padha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349a-46: n'a gendra rlu bam dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-0: bi ma la bi shuddha de ha sarbba p'a pa sha ma @349b ka sarbba bar na bi sho dha ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-1: sarbba ka li bi sha na ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-2: stee lo kya ba sham ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-3: sarbba satva bi sho dha ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-4: bo dhi satva ba ra da /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-5: sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa dhishthi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-6: aom padma bi bhu shi ta shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-8: aa ba lo ki ya m'ana /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-10: sarbba karma me s'a dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-11: aa mo gha p'a sha hri da ya siddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-12: guhya ni pa si ni ba ra da h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-14: grub pa don yod pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bshad ma thag tu 'byung po'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-18: log 'dren de dag thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel te gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-19: gnas kyang 'bar bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-20: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje dga' bas ba spu langs te skrag par gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-25: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-26: skrag par gyur pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-28: drang srongs pa gong ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-29: rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-32: klu gang dag chu na gnas pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-33: rgya mtsho chen po'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-34: lha gang dag langka'i grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-35: rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:349b-36: gang dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350a-1: mkha'i lha thams cad dang 'khrugs par gyur nas nam mkha' las babs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350a-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod pa'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350a-7: mand'a ra ba chen po'i char dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350a-9: lhab lhub kyi char pus mo nub tsam ri bo po ta lar phab ste lha'i sil snyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350a-11: ha ha zhes ca co dang ga zhi'i sgra bton nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad kyi don du rig sngags chen po 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350a-12: zhes ched du brjod pa chen po ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350a-13: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mchod pa'i phyir mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul te bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags chen po'i cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi mchog bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350a-14: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po rig sngags chen po'i snying po 'jig rten mgon po thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-1: cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po grub pa'i mchog las thams cad grub pa bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-2: de nas de'i don du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo grub pa don yod pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po ras kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i mchog cho ga dang yo byad du bcas pa bshad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-4: kun nas cha legs par phye ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-7: ri mo mkhan gtsang ma khrus byas pas gos gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang ldan par byas pas tshon lhag ma ma yin pa snod gsar bar bzhag la bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-8: dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral ba'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs shing rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-9: thor tshugs kyi g-yas su zla tshes kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-10: ri dvags ae na ya'i phags pa gyon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-11: phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-12: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-13: dbu gsum spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-14: ri'i steng na padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-15: zhal dbus ma zhi ba'i zhal bzhin 'dzum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-16: zhal g-yas pa 'jigs su rung ba khro gnyer can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-17: thor tshugs 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-18: dbu zla tshes kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:350b-19: zhal g-yon pa 'jigs su rung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-2: rgyal ba 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-3: phyag gcig na padma thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-4: gnyis pa rtse gsum thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-5: gsum pa don yod zhags pa sku'i phyed na 'dzin pa la bcom ldan 'das zhal khro gnyer can don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag la spyan gtod par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-6: bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag tu bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-7: 'od 'dom gang ba khor yug 'bar ba dang ldan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-8: g-yas phyogs na lha mo sgrol ma 'gying bag dang bcas shing lus btung par mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la mig gtod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-9: g-yon du padma'i rigs mdzes ma 'dzem bag dang bcas pa gsang sngags kyi tshul dang rjes su mthun zhing don yod pa'i zhags pa la mig gtod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-10: lha mo sgrol ma'i bar du gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-11: padma'i rigs mdzes ma'i bar du khro gnyer can bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-12: phyogs gnyis par lha mo dkar mo lag na padma thogs pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-13: padma'i rigs mdzes ma'i 'og tu pho nya mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-14: ral pa gcig ma'i 'og tu lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351a-15: gong du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-0: dbang phyug chen po me tog sna @351b tshogs thogs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-1: 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba gad rgyangs can khro bo don yod pa'i rgyal po dang smra ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-3: ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo po ta la na gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mngon sum du mthong bar rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-4: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-6: mthong ba tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad las thar par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-7: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-8: mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yongs su thar par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-9: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-10: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spong bas mthong ba tsam gyi mod la rnam par dag par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-11: mnar med pa la gzhol ba'i mthar thug pa yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-12: tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams brgya stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-13: 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:351b-14: 'chi ba'i dus na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du ston par 'gyur zhing dbugs 'byin par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352a-1: nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352a-2: sgrib pa thams cad dang bral nas tshe rabs brgya stong phrag lnga bcu rjes su dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352a-3: byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du skye ba 'di tha ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352a-4: 'di mthong ba tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352a-5: lhag par mang du byed pa lta ci smos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352a-8: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352a-18: btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig gis ras kyi sku gzugs bsgrub par bya ba de'i spyan sngar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352a-19: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod na; des na khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352a-20: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag brgya 'gyur du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po byas pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352a-21: gang zhig khro bo don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te chus dbang bskur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352b-0: des na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams @352b cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352b-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro snyam du de ltar shas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352b-2: gang gis don yod par grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mngon sum du thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas lan gsum bzlas te bskor ba lan bdun byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352b-6: me tog phul nas phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352b-8: des khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352b-9: gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352b-10: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352b-11: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal la mig gtad de lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis sbyar la snying gar bzhag cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:352b-12: tshul 'dis phyag rgya re re nas lan stong phrag brgya byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353a-0: rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan @353a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353a-1: ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brgya stong phrag khri bzlas brjod bya bar 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong phrag khris dbang bskur bar 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353a-3: rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cho ga zhib mo 'di rdzogs par lan brgya stong khri bzlas par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353a-4: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di lan brgya stong phrag khri bya bar 'dod pa des ras kyi sku gzugs la brtson par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353a-5: ras kyi sku gzugs mngon du bzhag nas gnas gtsang zhing dben pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353a-12: khang par gtsang sbra dang byi dor byas te ba ser mo'i lci ba legs par mnyes la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353a-13: ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te bskus la spos sna tshogs kyi byug pas byugs nas ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsandan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te gur gum gyis khru do'i tshad tsam bris la gla rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353a-14: ga pur gyis mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353a-15: dri chab kyi bum pa dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste ras kyi mgul chings kyis bcings la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353a-17: bdug spos dri zhim po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-0: me tog gi @353b phreng ba nyid shu rtsa gcig gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-1: dri chab kyis bkang ba brgyad phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-2: 'o mas bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-3: stegs bu'i drung du 'o mas bkang ba'i snod gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-11: zhun mar gyis bkang ba'i snod gzhag par bya; aa ga ru nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-15: shi ri p'a sa ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-16: cung peng rnams snod du bzhag nas aa ga ru'i yam sreg shing gis sbyin sreg bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-17: me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan par mar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bltam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-18: de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas tshes bcu bzhi nas bco lnga'i bar du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-19: de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te dri chab kyis dbang bskur bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-20: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-21: de nas mi smra bar skyil mo krung du 'dug ste bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:353b-22: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:354a-0: de'i 'og tu don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal @354a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:354a-1: bo stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:354a-2: de nas ras kyi sku gzugs las 'od zer bdun byung nas kun tu snang bar byas te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral pa'i spyan du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:354a-3: zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g-yo bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang yang snying dga' zhing ba spu ldang bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:354a-4: mdog mdangs yongs su dag par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:354a-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa'i phyag gi sor mo las lha'i chu 'dzag par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:354a-7: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag 'bar bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:354a-8: phyag na padma'i padma lo ma g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:354a-9: rtse gsum g-yo bar 'gyur zhing legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:354a-10: zhes bya ba'i sgra 'gyur bar 'gyur te; rigs kyi bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:354a-12: khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub kyi /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:356a-0: @356a *// mchod pa chen po byas nas ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa byas la nyin zhag gcig myung ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:356a-1: ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:357a-7: mig g-yas pa la bskus na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:361b-3: rig sngags 'chang gi rang gi khyim yang rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can ji lta ba de bzhin du rig sngags 'chang gi gzhal med khang mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:361b-4: rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas na 'byor ba ji lta ba bzhin rgyas par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:361b-14: rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye bas yongs su bskor bas nyin mtshan du srung ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:364a-2: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:364a-4: spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing de nyid kyi zhabs drung du skyil mo krung du 'dug la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bltas la /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:364a-6: bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sku gzugs g-yo bar 'gyur zhing sku thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:364a-7: rang gi lus spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:364a-8: tho rangs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:365a-4: gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig por la gu gul gyis bdugs te mgul du btags na /
