K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-6: rtag tu bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-7: kyi hud ces sgra sgrog par byed pa'i skrag pa de la skyabs med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-8: sems can thams cad rjes su brtse bas brtan par kun tu blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-9: 'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabs su gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-10: bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-11: bdug pa 'dis bdugs te gang gi don du ming nas smos pa yang ma rungs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-12: yang na byams pa yang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-13: yid la bsam pa rnams sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-14: 'dis bdugs te brjod pa tsam gyi mod la 'di rnams thams cad rtag tu 'grub par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-15: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsung dge pa'o; ;gza' zla ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-16: gza' nyi ma rgyu skar nyam bab la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-17: sgra gcan gyis zos pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370a-18: mi gang yin pa skye ba'i gnod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-12: sdug bsngal mi bzad pas nye bar 'tshe ba la bdug spos rgyal pos bdugs pas de'i skad cig la de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-13: bza' ba dang btung ba shin tu zhim po thob ste gos med pa'i skye bos gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-22: lhab lhub thams cad skad cig gis 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-23: gal te yang dag par sbyar ba yin na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-26: yid kyi shing rta thams cad mngon par smras pas 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-27: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gsung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-28: rtag tu 'di dag thams cad 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-29: yi dvags rnams kyis zas rnyed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-32: bdag gi sdig pa thams cad rtag tu grol bas dmyal ba las grol te dmyal ba mi bzad pa thams cad las grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-33: sdug bsngal thams cad las grol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-34: skye bo bde ba la rtse bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:370b-35: bde zhing bde 'gror 'gro la bde ba thams cad du thob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-0: bdug spos 'dis bdugs pas mchog gi @371a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-2: rdul dang mun pa can thams cad bdug pa bsnams pas sangs par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-4: nyi ma shar bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa rnam par sangs par byed pa bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-5: bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing dmyal ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-7: 'jigs pa thams cad las grol te sa bcu po thob cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-8: bde 'gro'i lam bzang po bstan pa de'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bdug pa chen po'i rgyal po chen po cho ga zhib mo dang rjes su mthun pa 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-10: 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar mchod rten la sa'i phyogs gang du bdug pa 'dis bdug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rtag tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-12: thams cad du rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-13: de bzhin du lung bstan pa'i sa'i phyogs der gangg'a'i bye ma bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs pa der rig sngags 'chang gis gang du bdug spos kyi bdugs pas rdo rje 'chang bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371a-14: rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang bcas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-0: bzhon pa @371b dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-1: rtag tu ri gangs ldan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-2: de bzhin du nor bu bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-6: gnod sbyin chen po yang dag shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-11: na da ku be ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-18: bzhon pa dang bcas pas nyin mtshan rtag tu gnas nas de bzhin nyid du srung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-19: bdag gi dpal sa gsum gyi lha mo rtag tu mchod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-20: rtag tu sa gzhi gang du bdug pa rab tu bdug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-22: de bzhin nyid du gsang ba pa dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-23: chos 'dzin pa la mkhas pa rnams rtag tu srung bar byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-24: de bzhin nyid du tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-25: drag po lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-26: de bzhin nyid du khyab 'jug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-27: lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad du dus rtag tu yang srung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-30: de bzhin du sgra gcan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-33: mtshan mo'i lha rnams kyis dus rtag tu srung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:371b-36: dung can ma'i lha rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-0: @372a *// nags kyi rtse mo'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-8: lha'i drang srong bdag nyid che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-12: lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-15: de bzhin du lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-17: nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang ste sa'i phyogs gang du bdug spos 'dis bdugs pa'i sa phyogs su rtag tu lha'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-23: mchog sbyin par de bzhin nyid du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-24: gnas der bdug spos gang yin pa de dag gis mchog tu bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-25: dri mnams pa tsam gyis myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob bo zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-26: sems can kun la phan don phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-27: sdug bsngal thams cad ldog byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-28: rdzas kyi ming rnams bshad bya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-29: lha dang mi rnams mnyan par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-30: aa ga ru dang rgya spos nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-31: de bzhin tsandan ser por bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-32: prikka nyid dang gi ham dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372a-33: kun tu ru bcas ma he'i mig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-0: ro dang sra rtsi pog @372b nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-1: de bzhin gur gum na landa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-2: aa ru ra bcas dpal bskor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-3: s'a ma kam dang spang spos bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-4: pri yam gu bcas tu ruska //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-6: na me ru dang gla sgang bcas; ;ru ta aa ga ru nag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-7: ga pur dang ni gla rtsi nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-8: lam ka gser shing 'bras bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-10: snu ha'i 'o ma nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-11: thod pa skal pa ldan nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-12: so ma r'a dza khyab 'jug mnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-13: shing dga' rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-14: n'a ku l'i dri n'a ku y'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-15: tshangs pa'i bu dang ku mu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-16: padma'i chu ba sbrang rtsi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-17: bu ram dkar po'i khu ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-18: 'di rnams lhan cig sbyar ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-19: bdug pa'i mchog 'di bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-20: mkhas pas legs par khrus byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-21: gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos bgos shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-22: zla ba nya'am bcu bzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-23: bcu gsum pa'am tshes brgyad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-24: rtag tu sbyar bya nyin mtshan gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-25: sngags la mkhas pas bdug spos 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-26: so so so sor kun sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-27: phyog rgya dkyil 'khor gsang sngags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-28: me tog bdug spos dri rgya chen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-29: mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-30: gtor ma'i las la mkhas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-31: mchod yon snod ni gang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-32: mgo la'ang dri dang til mar gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-33: mar me legs gru gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-34: legs sbas gtsang mar gnas de sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:372b-35: legs sbas gtsang mar gnas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-2: don yod zhags pa'i spyan snga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-3: 'dug nas yongs su dag pa'i lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-4: sdom dang byams pa'i sems bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-5: sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-6: sangs rgyas rjes su dran sgom zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-7: gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs te 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-9: khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-10: don yod grub pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshig dang yi ge shin tu gsal bar bzlas nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu padma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-11: de nas gsang sngags 'di stong phrag brgya bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te aa mo gha hri da yan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-13: tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-14: ma h'a ku ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-16: aa bhi shinytsa ya aa mo gha p'a sha ha ste sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373a-17: de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas te mnyam par bzhag la las thams cad la mkhas pas bdug spos kyi mchog la bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la bdug spos kyi rgyal po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-0: don yod pa'i zhags pa @373b snang ba rgya che ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-1: nor bu chen po'i sprin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal po yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-4: thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te bdug pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te ma h'a aa mo gha dza ya dza ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-6: de'i 'og tu bdag rang la bdugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-8: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-9: dge sbyong dang bram ze'i gzugs kyis de dang lhan cig smra bar byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-11: gang la gtam byas pa de thams cad tshe 'di la 'grub par 'gyur ro; ;de'i 'og tu mtshan mo rang gi gzugs ston par 'gyur zhing mchog sbyin par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-12: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-13: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:373b-14: sngon gyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa dmyal ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374a-2: mthong ba tsam gyi mod la thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374a-7: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374a-11: bram ze mdun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374a-12: rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374a-15: tshes brgyad la khrus legs par byas te gos gtsang ma bgos la; ba las byung ba lngas byugs pas khyim gyi phugs su dkyil 'khor byas la me tog dang mchod yon gyi snod gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374a-16: gtor ma dkar po nye bar gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs te phyogs bzhir phyag byas la bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdugs pa byas na; bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su gang ba la 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374a-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya la bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-0: @374b mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bdug spos chen po tsandan sbrul gyi snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-2: ta ma la'i lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-3: bdug spos mang po nam mkha'i ngos khebs pas mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-5: sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-8: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'og min gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bar thams cad bdug pa'i dris rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-12: zla ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-13: 'di la the tshom mi bya zhing yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-14: skad chen pos don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-15: des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-16: rig sngags 'chang de la yang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-18: yang dang yang du gzigs pa'i phyir byon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-19: bde ba can na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-20: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:374b-21: mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thugs rab tu dgyes par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-1: 'chang la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub stsol bar mdzad gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-2: klu thams cad la bdugs pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur zhing ha cang char ches na gcod par byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-3: char mi 'beb na 'bebs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-6: sprin thams cad gcod par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-7: bdugs pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'jig par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-8: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-9: ma mo'i gnas su bdugs na rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-11: sprin thams cad gcod par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-13: nag po chen po la sogs pa 'gugs par 'gyur zhing dbang du gyur nas 'dug par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-14: bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-15: g-yul 'gyed pa'i tshe bdugs na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-16: thams cad du bdugs pa tsam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-17: thams cad du sbyar bar byas na kun tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-19: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-21: de nas rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375a-22: bde ba'i phyir thig le bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-0: lus bsku ba byas na ya lad @375b dang go cha bgos pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba bshad par bgyi yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-2: don yod pa'i nor bu rgya chen po rdo rje'i zhags pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu gang sbyor bar byas pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-4: mkhas pas mdzod spu rnams su thig le byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-6: skye bo mang po'i nang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-8: de bzhin du rigs byed kyi tshogs bzhi'i nang du skar ma'i tshogs kyi nang na zla ba tshes pa bzhin du mdzes shing 'jigs pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-9: lha rnams thams cad ya mtshan skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-10: drag po yi ni cod pan 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-11: 'jig rten mgon po'i g-yas kyi dbu'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-12: dbu rgyan rtse phran zla tshes bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-13: gdong bkru ba ni mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-14: zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-15: smin ma rna ba dpral ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-18: sems can thams cad dga' bas blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-19: dga' zhing rtag tu tshig btsan 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-20: de yi mig gis gang mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-21: thams cad dbang du gyur par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-22: skyes pa la ni bsku byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-23: rtag tu rigs smra blo che zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-24: rtag tu ya lad go bgos pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-26: 'byung po rnams ni mi bzod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-27: gnod sbyin 'byung po gsang ba pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-28: rtag tu thub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:375b-29: stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-1: tu sred med stobs ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-2: glang chen stobs kyi stobs ldan 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-3: lha rnams 'dar ni yed yed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-4: klu rnams mtsho na skrag par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-5: gal te rig sngags smra ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-6: reg na ri rab lhun po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-7: g-yo bar 'gyur ba the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-8: rtag tu sred med stobs ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-9: stobs dang gzugs dang rtsal ldan 'gyur; ;nor bu rgyal po bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-10: 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-11: sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-12: dug rnams thams cad 'joms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-13: dpal dang skal bzang rtag thob 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-14: gang gi lag tu thogs 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-15: sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-17: de na de bzhin gshegs kun gyi; ;thugs skyes gsung skyes sras su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-19: bla ma rtag tu rjes 'brang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-20: rig sngags smra ba dbugs dbyung phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-21: de bzhin du ni srung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-22: rtag tu mchog ni sbyin par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-23: 'jig rten mgon po thub chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-24: bsod nams phung po chen po thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376a-25: gang zhig nor bu 'di 'chang ba de de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-0: de bzhin gshegs @376b pa de dag thams cad mthong zhing dngugs 'byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-2: dpal dang skal pa bzang po thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-3: rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-4: sems can thams cad kyi mchod pa gcig pur 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-5: dgra thams cad kyis mi sod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-6: phyag na rdo rjes de la rtag tu bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-9: phyag na padma yang rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-12: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu chen po bzung bas sdang ba bdud la sogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-14: log 'dren thams cad las rgyal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-15: pha rol tu pham par mdzad nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-16: 'dis rnga bo che la bskus te brdungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-17: chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-18: gang dag sgra thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-19: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dvags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-20: bya gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-21: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:376b-22: dam pa'i chos spong pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-0: mnar med pa la gzhol zhing gnas @377a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-1: pa dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-2: dmyal ba chen po bcu drug las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-3: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-4: de la dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-7: dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-8: rims thams cad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-9: 'di dung la bskus te bus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-10: chos kyi dung chen po bus par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-11: tha na dung gi sgra thos pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang slar ldog par mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-15: bu mo dag kyang skye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-20: smre sngags 'don pa'i sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-22: skye ba phyi ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-23: shi nas thams cad ris mthun par bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su padma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-24: lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377a-26: rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa; padma las skyil mo krung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377b-0: byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'od dpag med las mngon sum du chos kyi gtam thos par 'gyur @377b ro; ;zla ba yar gyi ngo la cod pan dkar po bcings te nor bu chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377b-1: bsgrengs pa tsam gyi mod la chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377b-2: 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa mthong ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying por chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377b-3: bdud 'dul ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377b-4: 'di bsgrengs pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377b-6: khrag khrug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377b-9: mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377b-17: sdang ba'i sems can rab tu zhi bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377b-31: ske bgegs pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:377b-35: rlung gis mi tshugs shing nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378a-0: mi mang pos yongs su gang @378a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378a-2: chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378a-9: shin tu 'jam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378a-10: thams cad du lha'i reg pa dang bcas pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378a-25: grib ma ngan pa zhi bar 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378a-26: sems can de dag thams cad phan tshun byams pa'i sems su 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378a-27: mchog tu yid bde ba'i gnas pas gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378a-28: yon tan dang phan yon chen po de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378a-29: nor bu'i rgyal po chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378a-30: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378a-32: grub pa'i rdzas kyi mchog nor bu gdags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378b-0: de bzhin @378b gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs shing lung bstan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378b-1: bdag gi snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378b-2: bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa rjes su bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378b-23: dz'a ta pa tri ka su ma na dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378b-26: shing aarga'i 'o ma rnams bsags te cha mnyam par byas la gser nyis 'gyur du byas te rgyu skar bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378b-27: tshes grangs shis shing dge ba la khrus legs par byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas nyin zhag gcig byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag ste phye ma zhib mor byas te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i gzungs stong rtsa brgyad bzlas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378b-28: khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gtor la dri chab bzang pos sbangs te sbyar la gser dang bsres la ga pur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378b-29: gla rtsi'i bdug pas bdugs te nor bu zho gnyis pa'i tshad du byas nas phug la ras skud kyis btags te gser gyis g-yogs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:378b-30: yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379a-0: @379a *// khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar bsgrubs par byas la de nyid kyi zhabs drung du grib ma la bskam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379a-1: phyed dam bzhi cha gser gyis g-yogs par bya zhing phyed g-yogs par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379a-2: gang la gser gyis g-yogs pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379a-3: gang la don yod pa'i zhags pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po dang 'dra ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379a-4: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379a-6: 'jig rten las 'das pa las chen po sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379a-7: gser gyis ma g-yogs pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379a-8: 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379a-39: gzhang 'brum thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-0: rims thams @379b cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-3: mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-4: bad kan las gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-5: 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-6: lus kyi nang gi nad thams cad la chu dron dang lhan cig sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-7: pha rol gyi nad thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-8: gnod pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-9: thams cad du dgos pa thams cad la sbyar ba tsam gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-11: gser gyis g-yogs pa dpung pa la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-12: thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-15: pha rol gnon pa phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-17: dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa bla na med pa rnam pa gsum po 'di la sbyar bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-21: yid la ji ltar bsam pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa'i de kho ni nyid 'grub pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-23: rgyal po btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-25: blon por bcas pa rtag tu bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-26: nor bu spyi gtsug tu bzhag nas rig sngags bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:379b-27: bgegs med par thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-0: lag pa g-yas pa la btags te rig @380a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-2: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga stong phrag brgya 'gyur du byas par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-3: lan gcig bzlas pas stong phrag brgyar rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-4: mgul par btags te bcangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-5: khrus ma byas pa khrus byas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-7: tshangs par mi spyod pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-8: thub par ma byas pa thub par byas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-9: smyung bar ma byas pa smyung ba byas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-10: tshig mi btsan pa tshig btsan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-12: dam tshig ma shes pa dam tshig shes par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-13: byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-14: sbyin pa gang chung zad ci sbyin pa chung ngu yang stong phrag brgya 'gyur du sbyin pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur; pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-15: nor bu 'di lag mthil g-yas pa la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-16: gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-17: su la yang brjod par mi bya ste; de'i 'og tu de dag thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-18: rked pa la btags te chu'i nang du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380a-19: chu klung chen po'i gting du sleb par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-0: de nas nor bu sgrub par 'dod pas dngul shin tu yongs su dag pa las padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kha phye ba dbus kyi snying po dang ze ba za ma tog 'dra ba sor bcu drug pa'i tshad du @380b [?] gsal [?] de'i dbus su gser gyi nor bu gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-1: ba lang gi lci ba ba lang gi gcin dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-2: kho ra khor yug tu padma bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-3: padma'i dbus kyi ze bar dngul las byas pa'i padma bzhag ste bum pa gang ba bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-4: gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-5: me tog dgram par bya; tshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bri bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-8: du ru ka'i bdug pas bdug cing gtor ma dkar po gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-9: 'phan gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brkyen [?] par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-10: mar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-11: 'bras bu dang me tog phreng sna tshogs gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin mtshan gcig smyung ba byas la tshes bco lnga nas nyi shu dgu dang gnam stong gi bar dus mtshams gsum du mchod par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-13: padma za ma tog de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-14: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod pa byas la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su mngon du phyogs te 'dug la bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:380b-15: khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-1: pa'i phyag rgya stong rtsa brgyad bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-2: de bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-3: mi smra bar dgos pa thams cad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-4: de'i 'og tu tshes bco lnga zla ba nya'i nang par gyi dus mtshams su nor bu'i rgyal po padma dang bcas te gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur; rig sngags 'chang dga' bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-5: nam mkha'i dkyil nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-7: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis padma 'bar ba de lag pa g-yas pas blang bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-8: blangs pa tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-9: rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-10: 'khor lo'i rgyal po gser gyi mdog can blta na sdug pa chen po mdun na gnas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-13: mi mdza' ba thams cad zlog par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-14: 'khor bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-15: tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381a-16: don yod pa'i rnam par blta ba'i nor bu chen po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-0: don yod pa'i dri ma med pa 'bar ba'i @381b rtse mo rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa 'thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-1: phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-3: nor bu chen po yongs su dag pa rdo rje la rnam par lta ba'i 'od kyi lus rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-12: lto 'phye chen po rnams bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-13: mgo bo'i spyi bor btags na nor bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis nub phyogs su song nas bde ba can gyi rab tu dbye ba gzhal med khang dang bcas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-15: legs par brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las chos snang ba'i sgo'i chos bshad pa chen po thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-22: phug gi gnas thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:381b-23: thams cad du rgyal ba'i rje dpon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-1: phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i sgo 'bye bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-2: dpung pa g-yas pa la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-3: mi snang bar 'gyur zhing lus mi snang ba gangg'a'i klung bye ba stong phrag brgya snyed kyi lus mi snang ba rnams kyi mchog rje dpon dang rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-4: dpung pa g-yon pa la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-7: 'byung po la sogs pa thams cad mi snang bar byas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-8: thams cad kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang sgo bye zhing 'dug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-12: brla g-yas pa la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-13: nags kyi phug gi gzhal med khang gi gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-14: sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na gnas par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-15: rkang pa'i rje ngar la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-16: rlung gi phung po dang po'i stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing cung zad tsam song bas dpag tshad stong phrag bcur 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382a-17: nyin mtshan gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rlung chen po'i shugs kyi stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis song ste slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-0: thams cad @382b du dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-2: sa'i 'og gi dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-3: sa'i 'og phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-4: rang ji ltar 'dod pa der 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-5: khar bcug na nyi ma re re tshigs su bcad pa stong lobs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-6: mid pa tsam gyis thos pa rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-7: lce'i rtse mor bzhag na lce padma dang ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur zhing thos pa mang po 'dzin par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-8: lag pa la byugs na gang la reg pa de bran bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-14: bram ze thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-15: nor bu sgrub pa'i cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-17: bdag la don yod grub kyi bum pa rab mchog ces bgyi ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga chen po mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:382b-18: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi mthu bstan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-0: ji lta ba der de ltar bcom ldan 'das bum pa chen po mthu sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgrub pa 'grub par @383a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-2: rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-3: de nas gser ram dngul lam zangs sam kham pa'i bum pa tshad dang ldan zhing kun nas shin tu zlum pa mgo'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-4: mgrin par byin pa'i tshad shin tu 'jam zhing thag thug dang shang shong med pa; dbyibs legs shing byi dor legs par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-5: kun nas yongs su gang ba la mtshal gyi mtshon gyis padma 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-6: mgrin par padma'i snying po dang ze ba bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-9: lhor mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-11: byang du yid bzhin nor bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyil mo krung du bzhugs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-12: padma'i 'dab ma la dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-23: lha'i tshogs gzhan dag bri bar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383a-30: pho nya mo dkar mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-1: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-4: padma'i 'dab ma'i khor yug tu padma'i phreng ba bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-5: de nas bum pa tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya zhing gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-6: rim pa'i cha bkra zhing mdzes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-7: de nas thang shing las padma'i gdan zlum po bum pa shong ba tsam gyi tshad du byas la de'i steng du bum pa bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-8: bum pa de yungs kar dkar pos bkang ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-9: ras dkar pos bcing bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-15: bum pa'i kha ras dmar pos g-yogs par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-16: rin po che sna bdun gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-17: de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la dkyil 'khor khru bzhi gru bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-18: 'phang du khru gang ba byas te ba lang gi lci ba dang sa bsres par legs par byugs te gru bzhi cha mnyam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-19: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dri thams cad kyis byugs la dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus su tsandan dkar pos dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:383b-20: gur gum dang me tog padmas mchod par byas te padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris la padma'i ze ba'i steng du bum pa bzhag ste 'phan gdugs sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-1: 'khor gyi snying po khor yug tu spos dang me tog sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-3: mchod yon gyi snod sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-4: bum pa gang ba mdzes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-5: bdug spos kyi phye ma rnam pa mang po gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-6: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-7: me tog phreng ci 'byor pa kun tu gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-8: mar gyi mar me bzang po bcu drug bltam par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-9: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas padma'i phreng ba bri bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-10: sgo bzhi shin tu mdzes par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-11: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mtshan ma gsal bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-12: mda' dang ba dan khor yug tu gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-13: tshon skud sna lngas bskor bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-14: ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang dkar gsum ci 'byor pa gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-16: bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-17: me tog sna tshogs gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-18: me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-19: me tog phreng ba bzang po kun tu gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-20: bdug spos kyi snod dang bum pa gang ba kun tu gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-21: pog phor bzhi gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-22: dri chab kyi phor bu bzhi gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-23: snod bzhi dang kham phor brgyad gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-24: ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dkar po rnam pa mang po gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384a-25: mar gyi mar me gang ba drug cu rtsa gnyis dbul bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-6: btung ba dan pa spang bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-8: gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la zla ba nya la bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-9: srung ba'i cho gas bdag bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-13: de bzhin du grogs srung pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-15: gu gul gyi bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-17: yungs kar gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-21: kun tu ru'i bdug pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-25: zha lnga smyung ba byas nas gsang sngags bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-26: dus mtshams gsum du bum pa dang sangs rgyas la mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-27: mi smra bar dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug nas lag pa g-yas pa bum pa'i steng du bzhag la khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-28: chu dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-29: yid la byed pa'i rtse gcig pas sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:384b-30: snying rje lhur len cing sangs rgyas yid la bya ba bsgoms la bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-0: de'i 'og tu tshes bco lnga nya'i thun tha ma'i nang par dbyig gi bum pa cher @385a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-2: legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po yang grag par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-3: bum pa chen po de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-5: dri ma med cing yongs su dag la dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-6: mdog yongs su dag cing me tog padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-7: ku mu da ltar dkar zhing 'jam par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-8: bum pa de'i sku gzugs rnams rang rang gi lus las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-9: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya chen po bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-13: de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gi dri'i chu dang yungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dbang bskur ba byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-14: dbang bskur ma thag tu bum pa de las sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-17: khyod kyis bum pa bzang po grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-18: bum pa bzang po ji lta bzhin du don yod pa'i snying po'i bum pa bzang po yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po yang de bzhin gyis ji ltar 'dod pa longs spyod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385a-19: yid la ji ltar bsam zhing bcol ba thams cad grub par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-0: de nas mchod pa chen pos gzhal med @385b khang chen po mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-1: bum pa bzang po de gzung bar bya zhing mchod pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-2: yid la ji ltar 'thad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-3: 'dod pa thams cad grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-10: cho ga zhib mo smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-19: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la sogs pa chos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-20: 'dul ba smra ba de dag thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-46: rtsed mo rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-47: rgyal po la 'os pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang sems kyis bsam pa tsam gyi mod la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-48: mig 'phrul gyi gzhal med khang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-49: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-50: byang chub sems dpa'i sprul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:385b-51: rdo rje 'chang gi sprul pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-4: lto 'phye chen po'i gzhal med khang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-7: 'byung po'i bdag po'i gzhal med khang de thams cad bsam pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-8: char ha cang ches pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-10: dus ma yin pa'i char dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-15: chu zlog par byed pa de thams cad ston par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-17: g-yul 'gyed pa ston par byed pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-20: dpal ston par byed pa de thams cad ston par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-21: de la sogs pa thams cad bsam pa tsam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-22: smon pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-28: ji ltar bsam pa de thams cad 'byor par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-29: gla rtsi de blangs la gi'u wang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-30: ga pur dang bsres te shing aarga'i 'o mas sprus te ril bur byas nas ba ser mo'i 'o ma la bdar te dpral bar thig le byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-32: rig sngags 'chang bye ba stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386a-33: snying gar thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-0: 'byung po thams cad kyi rje dpon du @386b 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-1: lce'i rtse mo la reg na nyin re zhing tshigs su bcad pa stong bklags shing 'dzin par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-2: mid na lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-4: thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-5: shing aarga'i 'o ma dang lhan cig zos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-6: rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-10: phyag rgya thams cad mngon du 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-11: lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas te chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-12: gting du 'bying bar mi 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-13: rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu yang phyin par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-14: spyi bor thig le byas te g-yul ngor zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-15: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas rgyal bar 'gyur /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-17: glang po che stong gi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-18: lag pa ya gcig gis glang po che bskyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-19: nam mkha' la 'phen cing slar yang 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:386b-20: ril bu 'dis lag pa la bskus na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387a-3: gtsug lag khang gi sgor brkos te bzhag na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387a-5: rtag tu byams pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387a-8: lhung bzed kyi nang du bzhag ste grong khyer mang por bsod snyoms la song na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387a-9: kha zas ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs 'bad mi dgos par thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387a-10: sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi gnas su brkos te bzhag la mchod rten la mchod pa byas na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387a-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du brkos te bzhag la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387b-1: lam po cher brkos te bzhag na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387b-8: ri'i rtse mor brkos te bzhag na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387b-20: nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387b-22: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston bzhed par 'gyur zhing rtag tu dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387b-23: bang bar brkos te bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387b-25: chang yod pa'i sgor brkos te bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387b-26: chang thams cad rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387b-27: zhing gi nang du brkos te bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:387b-28: lo tog mang po 'byor par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-3: phug gi sgo la byugs na phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-4: bu ga'i gnas su byugs na; ro thams cad 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-5: nags kyi phug tu brkos te bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-6: nags kyi lha thams cad rang gi mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-7: dgos pa gang byed pa de grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-8: padma'i mtsho'i nang du brkos te bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-9: padma mang po byung bar 'gyur zhing dus kun tu lha'i dri bsung 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-10: khyim mthon po'i gnas su bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-11: ji srid snang ba de srid du skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-14: bu mo rnams srung bar 'gyur zhing phyogs bcu kun nas dpag tshad brgya mtshams bcad par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-15: nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-19: 'go ba'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-20: pha rol gyi dpung thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-21: 'go ba'i nad thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-22: g-yul ngor yungs kar dang bsres te gtor na; g-yul 'gyed pa chen po phan tshun mdza' ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388a-23: nad chen pos lus bskams shing tshe zad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-0: bgegs chen pos zin la dri chab kyi bum par @388b ril bu 'di bsres te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te khrus byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-1: khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la nad thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-2: gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-4: sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-5: tshe yongs su zad pa'i tshe slar nur bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-6: lha'i lus gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-7: dri ma dang bral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-9: las gzhan dang gzhan stong phrag brgya byed par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-10: rang gi blos kyang thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-11: thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i las can du 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-12: phug gi gnas thams cad kyi rje dpon dang rgyal por 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-13: tshe bskal pa stong phrag bcu gnyis thub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-14: shi nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du padma'i snying po las rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa; nor bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-22: mu tig rnams kyis lus brgyan par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-23: skra bung ba ltar nag cing 'khyil la 'khyil ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-24: mig autpa la'i mchog sngon po lta bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:388b-25: pags pa'i mdog gser lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389a-2: rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi phyag brkyang ste phyag spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389a-3: phyag na padma'i phyag mchog sbyin pas dbugs 'byin cing khyad par mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389a-4: padma la rab tu gnas pa rnam par gzigs pa don yod pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'phags pa 'od dpag med lung ston par 'gyur ro; ;de nas yungs kar de de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag brgya phrag bye ba snyed kyi spyan du 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389a-5: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ring bsrel du 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389a-6: khams sna tshogs kyi kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mdog gi ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389a-7: nor bu rin po che bdun dang 'dra zhing 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389a-8: sku gdung re re yang nyi ma bzhin du so sor gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389a-9: phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer 'byung zhing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad de lus re re ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389a-10: ring bsrel 'di mthong ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389a-11: gzhan du yid la ma byas na de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de la smad par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-0: gzhan yang nyal kar rang gi blos byams pa'i sems kyis ring bsrel mngon du byas te @389b smon lam gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-1: ci 'dod pa bsam ste mchod pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-2: bsam pa tsam gyi mod la skad cig tu thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-3: ring bsrel gyi snying po 'di ji lta ba bzhin du bum pa bzang po 'di yang blta bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-4: de gnyis ka yang rdzu 'phrul mdzad par snang ba mthun pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-5: 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-6: bum pa sgrub pa don yod pa'i cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu'i spyi bor bzhag ste bka' stsal pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-10: don yod pa chen po'i bum pa sgrub pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-12: 'dzam bu gling pa'i rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-13: bde ba'i don du rab tu byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-14: sgrub pa shin tu bkra shis pa bla na med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-15: rang gi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-16: don yod pa chen po'i cho 'phrul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-17: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa; sgrub pa yang dag par sgrub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-18: che zhing che ba byang chub kyi snying po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:389b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390a-1: bde ba'i phyir dbugs 'byin pa chen po 'jig rten du bzhag pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390a-2: sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390a-4: bla na med pa sgrub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390a-6: rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390a-7: rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog tu yid dga' ste bzhin 'dzum nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390a-11: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390a-13: bya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis yongs su gzung bar bgyi zhing /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390b-2: mngon par brtson pa de dag ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390b-10: rtag tu rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390b-11: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390b-17: mchod par byed pa la mngon par brtson pa de /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:390b-19: phrag pas yongs su bkur bar bgyi'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:391a-17: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:391a-18: bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba'i lha rdzas thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:391a-19: cho ga zhib mo chen po sgrub par byed pa rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas la dgod par bgyi /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:391b-9: mi'i lus dag pa'i lus su rig par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:391b-10: lha zhes bya ba'i lus su rig par bya'o; ;bcom ldan 'das /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:391b-18: mi lus su rig par bgyi ba ma lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:391b-19: gang gi slad du zhe na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:391b-22: nang gi yid la gnas pa des /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:391b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod rgya mtsho chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:391b-28: don yod pa'i snying po'i lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:391b-30: ser sna dang phrag dog spangs pa'i lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-0: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par @392a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-2: dri ma med pa'i lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-12: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-14: phyag bya ba'i 'os su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-15: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsrung ba'i lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-17: tshe dpag tu med pa'i lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-18: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs phyung ba'i lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-19: lag na rdo rjes rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-20: rgya mtsho chen po zab mo'i chu'i rigs dgu dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-21: de ma thag tu lhun po chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-22: nam mkha' chen po yongs su dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-23: nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-25: lha'i khams kyi snying po mnyam pa'i lus su rig par bya'o; ;de ltar mthu chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392a-26: stobs chen po zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs shing lung bstan par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-1: 'on kyang sems can sgrub dka' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-2: khong du chud par dka' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-5: ser snas yongs su dkris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-11: zhe gdug pa mang ba des ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-13: sems can rang gi nyes pa lags kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-18: 'on kyang bdag dran pa tsam gyis snying po 'di klog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-19: kha ton du byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-20: bzlas pa tsam gyis yang dag par dgongs par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-21: mthong ba stsal bar bgyi'o; ;yang dang yang du bskul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-24: bdag la lta bar mi byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-25: bsam par mi byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-26: sems par mi byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-27: skad cig yud tsam thang gcig yid la byed pas kun tu 'dzin par mi byed lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-29: gdug pa'i sems kyis sems can rang gi nyes pas yang dag par gang ba'i lus lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-34: rnam par lta bar byed pa tsam gyi mod la mdun du nye bar 'dug par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-36: yang dag pa'i gtam kun tu smra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:392b-40: tha na sems kyi kun tu rtog pa tsam yang mi skye ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-1: par byed pa yang ma lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-3: dge sbyong gi cha byad skra bzhar zhing ngur smrig tsam 'chang ba'i cha byad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-5: rgyal rigs kyi cha byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-7: ded dpon chen po'i cha byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi cha byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-13: gos dmar po can la mkhan po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-14: slob dpon dang mtshungs par mkhan po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-19: sring mor nye bar lta bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-21: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa la gnas pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-27: yang dag pa'i gtam smra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-30: dus tshigs su 'gro ba yang dag par mtshon par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-31: yang dang yang du gtam kun tu smra ba la rnam par spyad par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-33: 'phags pa'i sems can no zhes blta bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-34: bdag la lta bar 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-35: bdag mthong bar 'dod pa der nye bar 'gro bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-36: de lta bu'i tshogs shin tu gsal bar mthong ba stsal bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-38: yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-39: skye bo chen po'i dbus su nyo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393a-42: yang dag par smra ba'i tha snyad yang dag par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-0: mdun sa'i @393b dbus su bstan bcos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-8: dri za'i glu dbyangs kyi tha snyad yang dag par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-9: byang chub sgrub pa la tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-11: theg pa chen po'i chos kyi man ngag lhag par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-12: bram ze rnams la sngon rabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-16: r'a ma ya na bstan par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-17: gsang sngags smra ba rnams la gsang sngags kyi bzlas brjod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-25: mngon spyod la sogs pa bstan par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-26: gang gis bdag mngon sum du mdun na 'dug par ci zhig gis shes par bya zhe na; rnam pa gsum gyis shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-28: 'jam zhing gnyen pa'i ngag mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gsal bar rab tu 'byed pa yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-29: ngag gsal ba yin pas te; thams cad du mchog tu smra zhing so sor khyad par du byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-30: kha nas autpa la'i dri dang ldan pa'i rlung gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-31: lus las kyang gla rtsi'i dri gnas pas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-32: 'on kyang 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs la shin tu dpal gyis 'bar bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:393b-33: des na rig sngags 'chang gis gzhan nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-0: 'jig rten gyi rigs bzhi po gang yang rung ba 'di 'phags pa spyan ras @394a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-2: zhes de gsal bar shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-4: dogs pa bskyed par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-5: rmi lam du yang thun mtshams bzhir sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibs su mthong ba stsal bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-7: yid kyi shing rta'i mchog rjes su stsal bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-8: lhun gyis grub pa las phan pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-9: phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byor pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-11: nam du yang rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-12: yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o; ;des mchog sbyin pa la ltos par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-14: rdzun du smra ba de'i dngos grub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-15: lha rnams de la srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-16: yongs su skyong bar mi bgyid pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-19: de yang sems can sdug bsngal can de'i skyob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-22: 'khra sar 'gyur bar bgyi; gdon mi za bar brtse ba med par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-23: zhes mchog tu bsgral bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-25: de ltar snying rjes yongs su zin pa'i yid kyis sems can thams cad bla na med par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-26: yang dag par gzung bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394a-27: sems can 'di dag la gdon mi za bar byang chub kyi sa bon rjes su gdab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-0: de nas yang @394b bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-1: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-3: sems dpa' chen po mchog gi snying rje can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-4: khyod sems can la mnyes gshin pa gang gis sems can de rnams thams cad snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ste mchod par byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-5: 'khor ba chen por spyod par byed pa las yongs su thar pa gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-6: bsad par 'os pa shin tu yongs su gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-13: sdug bsngal mang ba des na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-14: sems can de'i don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-15: phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-16: cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di'i ming 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-17: sgra rna ba'i bu gar lhung zhing thos par byed pa de'i sdug bsngal ches che ba de rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-19: sgrib pa thams cad yongs su grol te 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-20: dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa chen po las 'don cing yongs su grol par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:394b-21: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams sdig pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-1: bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su zad cing yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-2: de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-5: lan bdun thos pa tsam gyis sems can de rgal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-6: tshogs chen po bsags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-7: de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs phyung ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-8: byang chub kyi sa bon yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-9: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'on kyang sems can 'di dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa'i snying po dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-11: phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang bcas pa'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par nyan par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-18: mchod pa chen po byed pa de'i sems can de rnams phyir mi ldog par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-20: dogs pa bskyed par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395a-23: bdug pa lag tu thogs par 'gyur ba de'i sems can de rnams cher dag cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-0: kun nas phyogs bcu @395b rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-8: dge bsnyen ma gang don yod zhags pa'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-9: kun tu khro bo'i phyag rgya'i snying po 'di lan bdun smyung bar gnas pa'i cho gas mchod pa byed cing bzlas pa 'bul bar byed cing dbang bskur bar byed pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-10: mthong ba'i chos nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dngos su mthong ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod lag tu son par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-12: yid kyis the tshom mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-13: 'khon dang dregs pa thams cad yongs su spangs pas bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-14: snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung bas sems can de rnams thams cad kyi mthar thug par 'gyur bar bya zhing bzlas pa sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-15: gang yang don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'chad par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-18: ras ris chen po 'di lta bar byed pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:395b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu kun tu gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dam tshig chen @396a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-1: po'i snying po la rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-3: khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis dbang bskur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-7: bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-9: de bzhin du phan yon chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-11: yon tan chen po bskyed bar bya ba cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-12: cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-14: mthong ba tsam gyis mthong ba'i chos nyid la cho 'phrul ches che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlob pa lta ba 'di dag mtshungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-16: cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-20: don yod pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa glegs bam du bris pa lta bar byed pa 'di dag mtshungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @396b de rnams thams cad du yang dag par rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-1: yang dag par bsrung ba'i ched dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-2: yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i ched du mthong bar gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-3: glegs bam bris pa 'di yang mthong ba tsam gyis mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-4: sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-6: mthong ba'i chos nyid la dpal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-8: gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-9: shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su padma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-13: tshe dang bral ba yang tshe 'phel bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-14: nang rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-16: khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-17: mchog chen po grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-19: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-20: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:396b-22: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:397a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhin 'dzum zhing snying g-yo ba dang bcas pa 'od zer 'bar zhing snang bar byed bzhin @397a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:397a-1: pa; rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gis yang dag par brgyan pa'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:397a-3: bdag la padmo yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por kun nas don yod pa'i ras ris blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:397a-4: don yod zhags pa'i snying po gang gis don yod pa'i ras ris kyi bya bas de rnams thams cad la sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthong ba'i rnam 'phrul stong phrag mang po mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:397a-5: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:397a-8: gzugs gcig gi rjes su 'jug par mtshungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:397a-15: dbang phyug chen po phyug bdag chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:397a-27: skar ma'i tshogs lus gcig pus rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-027:397a-29: gang gis mthong ba tsam gyi mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang /
